</div></td><td>PROC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActBillableServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActBillableServiceCode"> </a></td><td>ActBillableServiceCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong> An identifying code for billable services, as opposed to codes for similar services used to identify them for functional purposes.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActBillableTreatmentPlanCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActBillableTreatmentPlanCode"> </a></td><td>ActBillableTreatmentPlanCode</td><td><div><p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActMedicalBillableServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActMedicalBillableServiceCode"> </a></td><td>ActMedicalBillableServiceCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong> An identifying code for billable medical services, as opposed to codes for similar services to identify them for clinical purposes.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActNonMedicalBillableServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActNonMedicalBillableServiceCode"> </a></td><td>ActNonMedicalBillableServiceCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong> An identifying code for billable services that are not medical procedures, such as social services or governmental program services.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong> Building a wheelchair ramp, help with groceries, giving someone a ride, etc.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActMolecularInteractionType<a name="conceptdomains-ActMolecularInteractionType"> </a></td><td>ActMolecularInteractionType</td><td><div><p>Chemical reactions in the widest sense of the word.</p>
<p><em>Examples:</em> Transcription (creating mRNA from a DNA gene), translation (creating a protein from mRNA), cleavage (hydrolysis of a peptide), substitution (replacing an element or residue with another, such as in glycosylation, phosphorylation), addition (adding a residue to a double bond), receptor binding.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActOralHealthProcedureCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActOralHealthProcedureCode"> </a></td><td>ActOralHealthProcedureCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**An identifying code for oral health interventions/procedures.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActOrderableProcedureCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActOrderableProcedureCode"> </a></td><td>ActOrderableProcedureCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Concept domain which includes those ActProcedureCodes which are appropriate for ordering.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>physical therapies</li>
<li>excisions</li>
<li>surgery</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>PROC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActProductReconstitutionType<a name="conceptdomains-ActProductReconstitutionType"> </a></td><td>ActProductReconstitutionType</td><td><div><p>DESCRIPTION</p>
<p>Identifies the nature (or type) of transformation that a (medicinal) product may undergo, prior to its administration to a patient.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Dilution</li>
<li>Dissolution</li>
<li>Suspension</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActProfessionalServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActProfessionalServiceCode"> </a></td><td>ActProfessionalServiceCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Denotes the specific professional service that has been performed. This is obtained from the professional service catalog pertaining to the discipline of the health service provider.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>adjustment of hearing aid</li>
<li>excision of skin lesion</li>
<li>stitching skin lacerations</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActSpecimenCollectionProcedureType<a name="conceptdomains-ActSpecimenCollectionProcedureType"> </a></td><td>ActSpecimenCollectionProcedureType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Used to further classify the type of specimen collection procedure being documented.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Venipuncture</li>
<li>Swab</li>
<li>Biopsy</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>SPECCOLLECT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActSubstanceAdministrationCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActSubstanceAdministrationCode"> </a></td><td>ActSubstanceAdministrationCode</td><td><div><p>Describes the type of substance administration being performed. This should not be used to carry codes for identification of products. Use an associated role or entity to carry such information.</p>
</div></td><td>SBADM</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19708</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td>SubstanceAdministrationActCode</td></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActSubstanceAdministrationImmunizationCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActSubstanceAdministrationImmunizationCode"> </a></td><td>ActSubstanceAdministrationImmunizationCode</td><td><div><p>The introduction of ??? with the intent of stimulating an immune response, aimed at preventing subsequent infections by more viable agents.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>SubstanceAdministrationActCode</td><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19709</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    SubstanceAdministrationActCode<a name="conceptdomains-SubstanceAdministrationActCode"> </a></td><td>SubstanceAdministrationActCode</td><td><div><p>Describes the type of substance administration being performed. This should not be used to carry codes for identification of products. Use an associated role or entity to carry such information.  Note that this code is a synonym of ActSubstanceAdministrationCode, and follows the original naming conventions for v3 Concept Domains, and is as published in the CDA R2 base; the naming conventions were corrected in later revisions of V3, but is kept here for backwards compatibility for the CDA R2 base.</p>
</div></td><td>SBADM</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>cda</td><td>ActSubstanceAdministrationCode</td></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActSubstanceDerivationType<a name="conceptdomains-ActSubstanceDerivationType"> </a></td><td>ActSubstanceDerivationType</td><td><div><p>Acts of producing a substance by processing input material in any way thus deriving the product substance from the inputs</p>
<p><em>Examples:</em> Fermentation, filtration, separation, extraction, or any complex procedure involving multiple such steps.</p>
<p><em>UsageNotes:</em> This domain may involve molecular interactions as components, but substance derivation - even if implementing a single defined reaction on the molecular level - implies not only that reaction but the methods and devices by which to induce that reaction.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>This domain may involve molecular interactions as components, but substance derivation - even if implementing a single defined reaction on the molecular level - implies not only that reaction but the methods and devices by which to induce that reaction.</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActSubstanceExtractionCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActSubstanceExtractionCode"> </a></td><td>ActSubstanceExtractionCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> In addition to the class code, further defines the type of substance extraction.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>excision</li>
<li>surgical</li>
<li>passive</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActBloodDonationType<a name="conceptdomains-ActBloodDonationType"> </a></td><td>ActBloodDonationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Defines the type of blood donation.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>autologous</li>
<li>directed</li>
<li>volunteer</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    NutritionModificationType<a name="conceptdomains-NutritionModificationType"> </a></td><td>NutritionModificationType</td><td><div><p>Concepts that are used to convey modifications to the food or serving utensils that should be given in a diet order. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences. They can also be specific to the order and not have any relationship to the allergies, intolerances, or preferences.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Vegetarian</li>
<li>Liquids separate from solids</li>
<li>Small Portions</li>
<li>disposable utensils (for psych or isolation rooms)</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      DietTextureModificationType<a name="conceptdomains-DietTextureModificationType"> </a></td><td>DietTextureModificationType</td><td><div><p>A set of concepts that identifies any texture modifications that should be made to a diet order.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Pudding Thick</li>
<li>Pureed</li>
<li>Easy to Chew</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  ActProductApprovalType<a name="conceptdomains-ActProductApprovalType"> </a></td><td>ActProductApprovalType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> An approval granted to a product by a regulatory agency or other government body.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Approval to sell</li>
<li>Approval to initiate clinical trial</li>
<li>Approval to market (i.e., advertise)</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>CNTRCT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActProductApprovalApplicationType<a name="conceptdomains-ActProductApprovalApplicationType"> </a></td><td>ActProductApprovalApplicationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A type of application made in order to obtain a product approval from a regulatory agency or other government body.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Application for new approval</li>
<li>Application for renewal of approval</li>
<li>Application for variation of approval</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActProductApprovalProcessType<a name="conceptdomains-ActProductApprovalProcessType"> </a></td><td>ActProductApprovalProcessType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A type of approval process by which a product approval is obtained from a regulatory agency or other government body.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Centralized process approval</li>
<li>Mutual recognition process approval</li>
<li>National process approval</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  ActProvenanceEventCurrentStateType<a name="conceptdomains-ActProvenanceEventCurrentStateType"> </a></td><td>ActProvenanceEventCurrentStateType</td><td><div><p>Types of state an act may exist in.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20547</td><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  ActReactionActionTakenType<a name="conceptdomains-ActReactionActionTakenType"> </a></td><td>ActReactionActionTakenType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A type of act that indicates the action taken by a practitioner or other responsible party in response to the reaction/event that is reported in the ICSR.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>failing device replaced</li>
<li>medication stopped</li>
<li>medication dose adjusted</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>ACT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  ActRecordOrganizerType<a name="conceptdomains-ActRecordOrganizerType"> </a></td><td>ActRecordOrganizerType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A code further classifying the type of record organizer. It is considered the unit of modification of the record, the unit of transmission in record extracts, and the unit of attestation by authorizing clinicians.</p>
<p><em>Examples:</em> document; authentication unit; transmission unit.</p>
</div></td><td>COMPOSITION</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActContextOfUseType<a name="conceptdomains-ActContextOfUseType"> </a></td><td>ActContextOfUseType</td><td><div><p>Identifies the heading under which a document is to appear in a pre-defined, pro forma table of contents for a collection of documents within a regulatory category.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>m1-1-forms (eCTD module 1, forms)</li>
<li>m1-1-1-fda-form-1571 (eCTD. Module 1, specific FDA form)</li>
<li>m3-2-s-drug-substance (eCTD module 3, section 2, drug substance by substance)</li>
</ul>
<p><em>Usage Note:</em> This usage is confined to a specific set of requirements related to regulatory documents in the context of RPS documents.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActKeywordsType<a name="conceptdomains-ActKeywordsType"> </a></td><td>ActKeywordsType</td><td><div><p>Codes for additional metadata to be assigned to document or context of use instances to organize a group of documents within the same table of contents heading. These external code systems specify the category or type of keyword (e.g. Species) and the applicable values.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Species code system</li>
<li>Species code</li>
<li>Sponsor's manufacturing site code system</li>
</ul>
<p><em>Usage Note:</em> This usage is confined to a specific set of requirements related to regulatory documents in the context of RPS documents.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActRegulatoryCategoryType<a name="conceptdomains-ActRegulatoryCategoryType"> </a></td><td>ActRegulatoryCategoryType</td><td><div><p>Identifies the regulatory processes and/or submission contents specified in law or practice for a particular realm used to organize submitted materials.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Application Type: NDA</li>
<li>Submission Type: Efficacy Supplement</li>
<li>Submission Unit Type: Amendment</li>
</ul>
<p><em>Usage Note:</em> This usage is confined to a specific set of requirements related to regulatory documents in the context of RPS documents.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      DocumentType<a name="conceptdomains-DocumentType"> </a></td><td>DocumentType</td><td><div><p>The kind of document. Possible values: discharge summary, progress note, Oncology note, etc.</p>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10870</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActFinancialSupportingAttachmentCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActFinancialSupportingAttachmentCode"> </a></td><td>ActFinancialSupportingAttachmentCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Identifies the type of document that was attached to support the processing of claims, adjudication decision determination or extensions to coverage.</p>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>6</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">          ActClaimAttachmentCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActClaimAttachmentCode"> </a></td><td>ActClaimAttachmentCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Contrains the type of attachment (document, XRAY, bit map image, etc.) included to support a healthcare claim. Vocabulary bound to this domain should be a specification for the type of document (i.e. WCB First Report of Acccident - Form 8).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20362</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>6</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">          ActSpecialAuthorizationAttachmentCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActSpecialAuthorizationAttachmentCode"> </a></td><td>ActSpecialAuthorizationAttachmentCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Identifies the type of document that is used to support a request which requires special authorization. Example values in this concept domain could be: coverage extensions, step therapy, medical report, lab result, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActICSRDocumentType<a name="conceptdomains-ActICSRDocumentType"> </a></td><td>ActICSRDocumentType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A type of document that has information related to the investigation of an adverse event or product problem report.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Autopsy report</li>
<li>toxicology report</li>
<li>clinical journal article</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActIdentityDocumentCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActIdentityDocumentCode"> </a></td><td>ActIdentityDocumentCode</td><td><div><p>Code identifying the type of identification document (e.g. passport, drivers license)</p>
<p>**Implementation Note:**The proposal called for a domain, but a code was also provided. When codes are available for the value set the code IDENTDOC (identity document) will be used as the headcode for the specializable value set.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActInformationCategoryCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActInformationCategoryCode"> </a></td><td>ActInformationCategoryCode</td><td><div><p>**Definition:**Indicates the set of information types which may be manipulated or referenced, such as for recommending access restrictions.</p>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19752</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActInformRequestType<a name="conceptdomains-ActInformRequestType"> </a></td><td>ActInformRequestType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Information type for which a provider is requesting routing of health information. This could include messaging of results or documents especially in the context of a specific service delivery location.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Diagnostic Image Interpretations</li>
<li>Lab Test Results</li>
<li>Electrocardiogram Reports</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActMedicationDocumentCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActMedicationDocumentCode"> </a></td><td>ActMedicationDocumentCode</td><td><div><p>Indicates the types of documents that can be associated with a medication or group of medications.</p>
<p><em>Examples include:</em> Patient monographs, Provider monographs, Drug protocols, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActProductDocumentationType<a name="conceptdomains-ActProductDocumentationType"> </a></td><td>ActProductDocumentationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong></p>
<p>A type of documentation that is used to convey information about a product or an aspect of its life as a product - ranging from production to disposition.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Bill of lading</li>
<li>product label</li>
<li>Report of Product Disposal</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActQualityMeasureDocumentType<a name="conceptdomains-ActQualityMeasureDocumentType"> </a></td><td>ActQualityMeasureDocumentType</td><td><div><p>A type of document used to represent a health quality measure (aka eMeasure).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20365</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActRPSDocumentType<a name="conceptdomains-ActRPSDocumentType"> </a></td><td>ActRPSDocumentType</td><td><div><p>Identifies the document type from a regulator-defined set of codes similar to the ICH-defined File Tags used on clinical study documents in an eCTD.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Pre-clinical study report</li>
<li>Study report</li>
<li>Sample CRF</li>
</ul>
<p><em>Usage Note:</em> This usage is confined to a specific set of requirements related to regulatory documents in the context of RPS documents.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActSpecialAuthorizationCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActSpecialAuthorizationCode"> </a></td><td>ActSpecialAuthorizationCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Constrains vocabulary to that which describes the type of documents that can be attached to a financial transaction such as a Special Authorization Request.</p>
<p>Example values under this concept domain could be: drug, device, service, etc.</p>
</div></td><td>DOC</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActGrouperType<a name="conceptdomains-ActGrouperType"> </a></td><td>ActGrouperType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Further defines the type of grouping of orders or events. <p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>requisition</li>
<li>pre-coordinated order set</li>
<li>custom order set</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>GROUPER</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActICSRRecordOrganizerType<a name="conceptdomains-ActICSRRecordOrganizerType"> </a></td><td>ActICSRRecordOrganizerType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A type of concept that is used within adverse event and product problem reporting to organize data - often clinical in nature - provided for an investigative subject or other party within the scope of the investigation.</p>

<ul>
<li>Medical history</li>
<li>previous drug reactions</li>
<li>immunization history</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>CATEGORY</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActRecordContainerType<a name="conceptdomains-ActRecordContainerType"> </a></td><td>ActRecordContainerType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Container of clinical statements. Navigational. No semantic content. Knowledge of the section code is not required to interpret contained observations. Represents a heading in a heading structure, or &quot;container tree&quot;.</p>
<p><em>Examples:</em>  category; document section; document body.</p>
</div></td><td>CONTAINER</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      DocumentSectionType<a name="conceptdomains-DocumentSectionType"> </a></td><td>DocumentSectionType</td><td><div><p>A type of document section (specialization of ActClass &quot;DOCSECT&quot;).</p>
</div></td><td>DOCSECT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        ActQualityMeasureSectionType<a name="conceptdomains-ActQualityMeasureSectionType"> </a></td><td>ActQualityMeasureSectionType</td><td><div><p>A type of document section within a health quality measure (aka eMeasure), used to cluster the various parts of the eMeasure into a more human navigable format.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20364</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  ActRegistryCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActRegistryCode"> </a></td><td>ActRegistryCode</td><td><div><p>This is the domain of registry types. </div></td><td>REG</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  ActRPSRegulatoryPolicy<a name="conceptdomains-ActRPSRegulatoryPolicy"> </a></td><td>ActRPSRegulatoryPolicy</td><td><div><p>Identifies different classes of regulatory policy that can be applied within a Regulated Product Submission.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActRegulatoryStatusType<a name="conceptdomains-ActRegulatoryStatusType"> </a></td><td>ActRegulatoryStatusType</td><td><div><p>Identifies a temporary or final legal status assigned to a submission by a particular regulatory realm based on the laws and practices of the realm.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Active (as authorized by section abc)</li>
<li>Approved (under section xyz)</li>
<li>Withdrawn (under section pqr)</li>
</ul>

</ul>
</div></td><td>ALRT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ActFinancialDetectedIssueCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActFinancialDetectedIssueCode"> </a></td><td>ActFinancialDetectedIssueCode</td><td><div><p>Identifies types of detected issues for Act class &quot;ALRT&quot; for the financial acts domain.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ClinicalActionDetectedIssueCode<a name="conceptdomains-ClinicalActionDetectedIssueCode"> </a></td><td>ClinicalActionDetectedIssueCode</td><td><div><p>Identifies types of issues detected regarding the performance of a clinical action on a patient.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      MedicationIssueTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-MedicationIssueTypeCode"> </a></td><td>MedicationIssueTypeCode</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Any type of issue that identifies a potential adverse situation that would or might occur with the described substance administration.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>adverse effect</li>
<li>drug interaction</li>
<li>drug-food interaction</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>ALRT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        DrugActionDetectedIssueCode<a name="conceptdomains-DrugActionDetectedIssueCode"> </a></td><td>DrugActionDetectedIssueCode</td><td><div><p>Proposed therapy may be contraindicated or ineffective based on an existing or recent drug therapy</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActObservationVerificationType<a name="conceptdomains-ActObservationVerificationType"> </a></td><td>ActObservationVerificationType</td><td><div><p>Identifies the type of verification investigation being undertaken with respect to the subject of the verification activity.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>Verification of eligibility for coverage under a policy or program - aka enrolled/covered by a policy or program</li>
<li>Verification of record - e.g., person has record in an immunization registry</li>
<li>Verification of enumeration - e.g. NPI</li>
<li>Verification of Board Certification - provider specific</li>
<li>Verification of Certification - e.g. JAHCO, NCQA, URAC</li>
<li>Verification of Conformance - e.g. entity use with HIPAA, conformant to the CCHIT EHR system criteria</li>
<li>Verification of Provider Credentials</li>
<li>Verification of no adverse findings - e.g. on National Provider Data Bank, Health Integrity Protection Data Base (HIPDB)</li>
</ol>
</div></td><td>VERIF</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19794</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActPatientAnnotationCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActPatientAnnotationCode"> </a></td><td>ActPatientAnnotationCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Provides a categorization for annotations recorded directly against the patient</p>
</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20329</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActPrivilegeCategorization<a name="conceptdomains-ActPrivilegeCategorization"> </a></td><td>ActPrivilegeCategorization</td><td><div><p>An Act which characterizes a Privilege can have additional observations to provide a finer definition of the requested or conferred privilege. This domain describes the categories under which this additional information is classified.</p>
</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActPrivilegeCategorizationType<a name="conceptdomains-ActPrivilegeCategorizationType"> </a></td><td>ActPrivilegeCategorizationType</td><td><div><p>This domain includes observations used to characterize a privilege, under which this additional information is classified.</p>
<p>*Examples:*A privilege to prescribe drugs has a RESTRICTION that excludes prescribing narcotics; a surgical procedure privilege has a PRE-CONDITION that it requires prior Board approval.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ActSecurityObjectCode<a name="conceptdomains-ActSecurityObjectCode"> </a></td><td>ActSecurityObjectCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**An access control object used to manage permissions and capabilities of users within information systems. (See HL7 RBAC specification fo examples of thes objects.)</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    AdverseSubstanceAdministrationEventActionTakenType<a name="conceptdomains-AdverseSubstanceAdministrationEventActionTakenType"> </a></td><td>AdverseSubstanceAdministrationEventActionTakenType</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong> Indicates the class of actions taken with regard to a substance administration related adverse event. This characterization offers a judgment of the practitioner&quot;s response to the patient&quot;s problem.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong> Example values include dose withdrawn, dose reduced, dose not changed.</p>
<p><strong>NOTE:</strong> The concept domain is currently supported by a value set created by the International Conference on Harmonization</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    AgeObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-AgeObservationType"> </a></td><td>AgeObservationType</td><td><div><p>Categorization of types of observation that captures a person's age as a numeric quantity.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.11.79</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    CommonClinicalObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-CommonClinicalObservationType"> </a></td><td>CommonClinicalObservationType</td><td><div><p>Used in a patient care message to report and query simple clinical (non-lab) observations.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      CommonCodedClinicalObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-CommonCodedClinicalObservationType"> </a></td><td>CommonCodedClinicalObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies the type for a clinical observation whose value is expressed as a code.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Home support level</li>
<li>Tumor staging</li>
<li>abdominal pain characteristic</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>5</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">        CommonCodedClinicalObservationComponentType<a name="conceptdomains-CommonCodedClinicalObservationComponentType"> </a></td><td>CommonCodedClinicalObservationComponentType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Represents the components of a coded clinical observation.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>ability to articulate</li>
<li>ability to chop food</li>
<li>ability to crouch</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    CultureObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-CultureObservationType"> </a></td><td>CultureObservationType</td><td><div><p>**Description:**To be used to code and identify the Microbiology laboratory orderable and resultable observation question.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Urine; Culture</li>
<li>Deep Wound; Aerobic Culture</li>
<li>Microscopic Examination; Gram Stain</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      OrganismIdentificationObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-OrganismIdentificationObservationType"> </a></td><td>OrganismIdentificationObservationType</td><td><div><p>**Description:**To be used to code and identify the Microbiology laboratory observation code that relates to the microorganism identification.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Bacteria identified</li>
<li>Bacteria identified in tissue</li>
<li>Fungus identified</li>

</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    DeviceCharacteristicObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-DeviceCharacteristicObservationType"> </a></td><td>DeviceCharacteristicObservationType</td><td><div><p>Identifies characteristics (physical, visual, clinical) that may be observed for a particular device or device type.</p>

<li>Sterility</li>
<li>External diameter</li>

</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    DiagnosticImageCode<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosticImageCode"> </a></td><td>DiagnosticImageCode</td><td><div><p>Identifies the types of diagnostic image.</p>
<p><em>Examples:</em> Echocardiogram, electocardiogram, X-ray.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    DiagnosticImageReportObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosticImageReportObservationType"> </a></td><td>DiagnosticImageReportObservationType</td><td><div><p>Identifies the type of diagnostic image report.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Echocardiogram Report</li>
<li>Ultrasound Report</li>
<li>Nuclear Medicine Imaging Report</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    DiseaseCategorizationObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-DiseaseCategorizationObservationType"> </a></td><td>DiseaseCategorizationObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> An observation that categorizes an existing observation of a disease, symptom or condition.</p>
<p><em>Usage Note:</em> The act being categorized should be an observation of a disease, symptom or condition; the categorizing act should be an observation of the category of that disease, symptom or condition, and the relationship between the two acts should be a &quot;has generalization&quot; relationship.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>[Observation of] &quot;thrombocytopenia&quot; is categorized as an observation of &quot;Haematologic system&quot; category</li>
<li>[Observation of] &quot;duodenal ulcer&quot; is categorized as an observation of &quot;Gastro-intestinal system&quot; category</li>
<li>[Observation of] &quot;eczema&quot; is categorized as an observation of &quot;Dermatologic system&quot; category</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ECGAnnotationType<a name="conceptdomains-ECGAnnotationType"> </a></td><td>ECGAnnotationType</td><td><div><p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ECGControlVariable<a name="conceptdomains-ECGControlVariable"> </a></td><td>ECGControlVariable</td><td><div><p>Identifies types of observations about the parameters required for acquisition and processing of ECG data.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>item byte order</li>
<li>sample rate</li>
<li>displayed sweep rate</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ECGObservationSequenceType<a name="conceptdomains-ECGObservationSequenceType"> </a></td><td>ECGObservationSequenceType</td><td><div><p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    EventFrequencyObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-EventFrequencyObservationType"> </a></td><td>EventFrequencyObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies types of observations that describe or categorize an observation in terms of the frequency of the observed event occurring.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Very common</li>
<li>Uncommon</li>
<li>Rare</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    FDALabelData<a name="conceptdomains-FDALabelData"> </a></td><td>FDALabelData</td><td><div><p>FDA label data</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    FinancialClinicalSupportingObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-FinancialClinicalSupportingObservationType"> </a></td><td>FinancialClinicalSupportingObservationType</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Describes the supporting information for financial transactions such as a Special Authorization Request.</p>
<p>Example values under this concept domain could be: height, weight, duration of disease, site of fistula, etc.</p>
<p>This concept domain is intended to be used as part of a code/value pair within a generic structure that would convey ANY sort of information or proof of criteria that is needed to support a special authorization request.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    GeneticObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-GeneticObservationType"> </a></td><td>GeneticObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies the kinds of genetic observations that can be performed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20293</td><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ICSRContextualObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-ICSRContextualObservationType"> </a></td><td>ICSRContextualObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A type of observation on an investigative subject or a related entity that might be collected to provide the medical and social context for an adverse event report.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Diagnosis</li>
<li>laboratory result</li>
<li>autopsy determined cause of death</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ImmunizationForecastDate<a name="conceptdomains-ImmunizationForecastDate"> </a></td><td>ImmunizationForecastDate</td><td><div><p>Specifies the type of date that is specified in an immunization forecast. The immunization forecast defines the schedule for a vaccine based on variables like the subject's age, the type of vaccine, and the supply unit. The immunization forecast may involve multiple administrations in a series or just one administration. Each of the administrations has one or more recommended dates.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Earliest recommended date</li>
<li>Recommended date</li>
<li>Latest acceptable date</li>
<li>Overdue date (date after which to start sending reminders)</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.82</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ImmunizationObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-ImmunizationObservationType"> </a></td><td>ImmunizationObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Types of observations which describe characteristics of the immunization material.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20410</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    IndividualCaseSafetyReportType<a name="conceptdomains-IndividualCaseSafetyReportType"> </a></td><td>IndividualCaseSafetyReportType</td><td><div><p>Types of case safety report received from sender. The current code example reference is from the International Conference on Harmonization (ICH) Expert Workgroup guideline on Clinical Safety Data Management: Data Elements for Transmission of Individual Case Safety Reports. The unknown/unavailable option allows the transmission of information from a secondary sender where the initial sender did not specify the type of report.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20394</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ICSR_InvestigationAssessmentActType<a name="conceptdomains-ICSR_InvestigationAssessmentActType"> </a></td><td>ICSR_InvestigationAssessmentActType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Concepts that define the primary orientation of a product related investigation.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Product defect</li>
<li>adverse event</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>ACT</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      IndividualCaseSafetyReportCriteria<a name="conceptdomains-IndividualCaseSafetyReportCriteria"> </a></td><td>IndividualCaseSafetyReportCriteria</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Includes those concepts that are provided to justify the fact that an adverse event or product problem is required to be reported in an expedited fashion.</p>
</div></td><td>INVSTG</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      IndividualCaseSafetyReportProductCharacteristic<a name="conceptdomains-IndividualCaseSafetyReportProductCharacteristic"> </a></td><td>IndividualCaseSafetyReportProductCharacteristic</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Includes relevant pieces of information about a product or its process of creation. The vocabulary domain is used to characterize products when they are cited in adverse event or product problem reports.</p>
<p>**Examples:**Weight, color, dimensions.</p>
</div></td><td>INVSTG</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    IsolateObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-IsolateObservationType"> </a></td><td>IsolateObservationType</td><td><div><p>**Description:**To be used in the message when there is a requirement to communicate a result observation code that relates to a specific isolate.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Colony count</li>
<li>Colony count; Viability count FDA method</li>
<li>Growth rate; Visual method</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    KnowledgeSubjectObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-KnowledgeSubjectObservationType"> </a></td><td>KnowledgeSubjectObservationType</td><td><div><p>Categorization of types of observation that capture the main clinical knowledge subject which may be a medication, a laboratory test, a disease.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20384</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    KnowledgeSubTopicObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-KnowledgeSubTopicObservationType"> </a></td><td>KnowledgeSubTopicObservationType</td><td><div><p>Categorization of types of observation that capture a knowledge subtopic which might be treatment, etiology, or prognosis.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20385</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    MedicationObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-MedicationObservationType"> </a></td><td>MedicationObservationType</td><td><div><p>Identifies types of observations that can be made about a particular drug or medication.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16226</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      MedicationSafetyReportObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-MedicationSafetyReportObservationType"> </a></td><td>MedicationSafetyReportObservationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies types of observations about the Safety Reports required for a particular medication.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>[Observation of] International Birth Date</li>
<li>[Observation of] Data Lock Point</li>
<li>[Observation of] Frequency of Safety Report Submission</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      PhysicalCharacteristicsMedicationObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-PhysicalCharacteristicsMedicationObservationType"> </a></td><td>PhysicalCharacteristicsMedicationObservationType</td><td><div><p>Identifies physical characteristics that may be observed for a particular medicinal product or medicinal product package of types thereof.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Height</li>
<li>Imprint</li>
<li>Shape</li>
<li>Color</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationActAgeGroupType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationActAgeGroupType"> </a></td><td>ObservationActAgeGroupType</td><td><div><p>**Description:**To allow queries to specify useful information about the age of the patient without disclosing possible protected health information.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.11.80</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationAllergyTestCode<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationAllergyTestCode"> </a></td><td>ObservationAllergyTestCode</td><td><div><p>**Description:**Dianostic procedures ordered or performed to evaluate whether a sensitivity to a substance is present. This test may be associated with specimen collection and/or substance administration challenge actiivities.</p>
<p>**Example:**Skin tests and eosinophilia evaluations.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationAllergyTestType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationAllergyTestType"> </a></td><td>ObservationAllergyTestType</td><td><div><p>Indicates the type of allergy test performed or to be performed. E.g. the specific antibody or skin test performed</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationCaseStatusType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationCaseStatusType"> </a></td><td>ObservationCaseStatusType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A code used to further identify the type of case status observation. Used with the OBS ActClass.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Clinical status</li>
<li>Administrative status</li>
<li>Reporting status</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationCausalityAssessmentType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationCausalityAssessmentType"> </a></td><td>ObservationCausalityAssessmentType</td><td><div><p>**Description:**A kind of observation that allows a Secondary Observation (source act) to assert (at various levels of probability) that the target act of the association (which may be of any type of act) is implicated in the etiology of another observation that is named as the subject of the Secondary Observation</p>
<p>**Example:**Causality assertions where an accident is the cause of a symptom; predisposition assertions where the genetic state plus environmental factors are implicated in the development of a disease; reaction assertions where a substance exposure is associated with a finding of wheezing.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationCoordinateAxisType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationCoordinateAxisType"> </a></td><td>ObservationCoordinateAxisType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies the individual coordinate in the coordinate system inclusive of any transformations or projections.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong> meridian, range, township, longitude, latitude, lot, block, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20326</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationCoordinateSystemType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationCoordinateSystemType"> </a></td><td>ObservationCoordinateSystemType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies the coordinate system inclusive of any transformation projections.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20325</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationDosageDefinitionPreconditionType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationDosageDefinitionPreconditionType"> </a></td><td>ObservationDosageDefinitionPreconditionType</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong></p>
<p>The set of observation type concepts that can be used to express pre-conditions to a particular dosage definition.</p>
<p>Rationale: Used to constrain the set of observations to those related to the applicability of a dosage, such as height, weight, age, pregnancy, liver function, kidney function, etc. For example, in drug master-file type records indicating when a specified dose is applicable.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationGenomicFamilyHistoryType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationGenomicFamilyHistoryType"> </a></td><td>ObservationGenomicFamilyHistoryType</td><td><div><p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationIndicationType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationIndicationType"> </a></td><td>ObservationIndicationType</td><td><div><p>Includes all codes defining types of indications such as diagnosis, symptom and other indications such as contrast agents for lab tests</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationIntoleranceType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationIntoleranceType"> </a></td><td>ObservationIntoleranceType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Types of sensitivity caused by an exposure to a substance which results in an abnormal immunologic or non-immunologic response.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Food allergy</li>
<li>Environmental allergy</li>
<li>Fod intolerance</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationInvestigationType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationInvestigationType"> </a></td><td>ObservationInvestigationType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong>  Used to further classify the type of investigation being documented. This concept domain is intended to be used with the INVSTG Act class code.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Public health case investigation</li>
<li>Safety investigation</li>
<li>Surveillance investigation</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationType"> </a></td><td>ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationType</td><td><div><p>Distinguishes the kinds of coded observations that could be the trigger for clinical issue detection. These are observations that are not measurable, but instead can be defined with codes. Coded observation types include: Allergy, Intolerance, Medical Condition, Pregnancy status, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19712</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationIssueTriggerMeasuredObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationIssueTriggerMeasuredObservationType"> </a></td><td>ObservationIssueTriggerMeasuredObservationType</td><td><div><p>Distinguishes between the kinds of measurable observations that could be the trigger for clinical issue detection. Measurable observation types include: Lab Results, Height, Weight.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationLabReportType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationLabReportType"> </a></td><td>ObservationLabReportType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> A set of codes specifying the type of Laboratory Report.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationPublicHealthCaseType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationPublicHealthCaseType"> </a></td><td>ObservationPublicHealthCaseType</td><td><div><p>**Definition:**Identifies the kinds of public health cases. <p>Examples of types of public health cases includes reportable disease cases, radiation exposure cases and chemical exposure cases.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>2020-01-01</td><td>CWE</td><td>2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20366</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationQueryMatchType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationQueryMatchType"> </a></td><td>ObservationQueryMatchType</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong> An observation related to a query response.</p>
<p>**Example:**The degree of match or match weight returned by a matching algorithm in a response to a query.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationResultableType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationResultableType"> </a></td><td>ObservationResultableType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> Identifies the type of observation that can be resulted. There are some labs which are not ordered and are performed and resulted when the outcome of an ordered test meets some criteria.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>outcomes of lab tests</li>
<li>device summary</li>
<li>therapeutic drug level testing</li>
</ul>
</div></td><td>OBS</td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>4</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">      ObservationResultableLabType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationResultableLabType"> </a></td><td>ObservationResultableLabType</td><td><div><p><strong>Description:</strong> The type of lab observation being resulted. There are some lab tests which are not ordered and are performed and resulted when the outcome of an ordered test meets some criteria.</p>
<p><strong>Examples:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>red blood cell count</li>
<li>results of micro sensitivity testing</li>
<li><em>Missing third example</em></li>
</ul>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    ObservationVisionPrescriptionType<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationVisionPrescriptionType"> </a></td><td>ObservationVisionPrescriptionType</td><td><div><p><strong>Definition:</strong> Identifies the type of Vision Prescription Observation that is being described.</p>
<p><em>OpenIssue:</em> This concept domain should be reviewed to determine whether it needs a &quot;ConceptualSpaceForClassCode&quot; property to link to a RIM classCode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v3</td><td/></tr><tr><td>3</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">    PatientCharacteristicObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-PatientCharacteristicObservationType"> </a></td><td>PatientCharacteristicObservationType</td><td><div><p>Indicates the type of characteristics a patient should have for a given therapy to be appropriate.
