</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AccidentCode<a name="conceptdomains-AccidentCode"> </a></td><td>Accident Code (0050)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of accident.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DiagnosisCode<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosisCode"> </a></td><td>Diagnosis Code (0051)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the primary diagnosis code for billing purposes.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DiagnosisType<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosisType"> </a></td><td>Diagnosis Type (0052)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a type of diagnosis being sent.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DiagnosisRelatedGroup<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosisRelatedGroup"> </a></td><td>Diagnosis Related Group (0055)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the diagnostic related group (DRG) for the transaction.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DrgGrouperReviewCode<a name="conceptdomains-DrgGrouperReviewCode"> </a></td><td>DRG Grouper Review Code (0056)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for that the grouper results have been reviewed and approved.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentCode<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentCode"> </a></td><td>Consent Code (0059)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of consent that was obtained for permission to treat the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CheckDigitScheme<a name="conceptdomains-CheckDigitScheme"> </a></td><td>Check Digit Scheme (0061)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the check digit scheme employed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventReason<a name="conceptdomains-EventReason"> </a></td><td>Event Reason (0062)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the reason for an event.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Relationship<a name="conceptdomains-Relationship"> </a></td><td>Relationship (0063)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an actual personal relationship that the next of kin/associated party has to a patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">FinancialClass<a name="conceptdomains-FinancialClass"> </a></td><td>Financial Class (0064)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the financial class assigned to a person.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenActionCode<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenActionCode"> </a></td><td>Specimen Action Code (0065)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for actions to be taken with respect to the specimens that accompany or precede an order.  The purpose of these are to further qualify (when appropriate) the general action indicated by the order control code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EmploymentStatusV2<a name="conceptdomains-EmploymentStatusV2"> </a></td><td>Employment Status (0066)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the guarantor's employment status.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">GuarantorType<a name="conceptdomains-GuarantorType"> </a></td><td>Guarantor Type (0068)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of guarantor, e.g., individual, institution, etc.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">HospitalService<a name="conceptdomains-HospitalService"> </a></td><td>Hospital Service (0069)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the treatment or type of surgery the patient is scheduled to receive.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InsurancePlanId<a name="conceptdomains-InsurancePlanId"> </a></td><td>Insurance Plan ID (0072)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the identifier of an insurance plan with which a transaction should be associated.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InterestRateCode<a name="conceptdomains-InterestRateCode"> </a></td><td>Interest Rate Code (0073)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the amount of interest that will be charged the guarantor on any outstanding amounts.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DiagnosticServiceSectionId<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosticServiceSectionId"> </a></td><td>Diagnostic Service Section ID (0074)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a section of a diagnostic service where an observation may be performed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MessageType<a name="conceptdomains-MessageType"> </a></td><td>Message Type (0076)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for message types.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InterpretationCodes<a name="conceptdomains-InterpretationCodes"> </a></td><td>Interpretation Codes (0078)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a categorical assessment of an observation value.
Discussion: These interpretation codes are sometimes called &quot;abnormal flags&quot;, however, the judgment of normalcy is just one of the common rough interpretations, and is often not relevant. For example, the susceptibility interpretations are not about &quot;normalcy&quot;, and for any observation of a pathologic condition, it does not make sense to state the normalcy, since pathologic conditions are never considered &quot;normal.&quot;</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NatureOfAbnormalTesting<a name="conceptdomains-NatureOfAbnormalTesting"> </a></td><td>Nature of Abnormal Testing (0080)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the nature of an abnormal test.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OutlierType<a name="conceptdomains-OutlierType"> </a></td><td>Outlier Type (0083)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of outlier (i.e. period of care beyond DRG-standard stay in facility) that has been paid.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PerformedBy<a name="conceptdomains-PerformedBy"> </a></td><td>Performed by (0084)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a composite number/name of a person/group that performed a test/procedure/transaction, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ObservationResultStatusCodesInterpretation<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationResultStatusCodesInterpretation"> </a></td><td>Observation Result Status Codes Interpretation (0085)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for observation result status. These codes reflect the current completion status of the results for one Observation Identifier.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PlanId<a name="conceptdomains-PlanId"> </a></td><td>Plan ID (0086)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the coding structure that identifies the various plan types (i.e., Medicare, Medicaid, Blue Cross, HMO, etc.).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Pre-admitTestIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-Pre-admitTestIndicator"> </a></td><td>Pre-Admit Test Indicator (0087)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the patient must have pre-admission testing done in order to be admitted.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcedureCode<a name="conceptdomains-ProcedureCode"> </a></td><td>Procedure Code (0088)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a unique identifier assigned to a procedure, if any, associated with a charge.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2QueryPriority<a name="conceptdomains-V2QueryPriority"> </a></td><td>Query Priority (0091)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a time frame in which a querry response is expected.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Re-admissionIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-Re-admissionIndicator"> </a></td><td>Re-Admission Indicator (0092)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReleaseInformation<a name="conceptdomains-ReleaseInformation"> </a></td><td>Release Information (0093)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the healthcare provider can release information about a patient and what information can be released.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TypeOfAgreement<a name="conceptdomains-TypeOfAgreement"> </a></td><td>Type of Agreement (0098)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for codes to further identify an insurance plan.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VipIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-VipIndicator"> </a></td><td>VIP Indicator (0099)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a type of VIP.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InvocationEvent<a name="conceptdomains-InvocationEvent"> </a></td><td>Invocation event (0100)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for codes for an event precipitating/triggering a charge activity.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessingId<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessingId"> </a></td><td>Processing ID (0103)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the message is part of a production, training or debugging system.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VersionId<a name="conceptdomains-VersionId"> </a></td><td>Version ID (0104)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which are used to identify an HL7 version in the Version 2.x family of published standards.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SourceOfComment<a name="conceptdomains-SourceOfComment"> </a></td><td>Source of Comment (0105)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which are used to specify the source of a comment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransferToBadDebtCode<a name="conceptdomains-TransferToBadDebtCode"> </a></td><td>Transfer to Bad Debt Code (0110)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for that the account was transferred to bad debts and gives the reason.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DeleteAccountCode<a name="conceptdomains-DeleteAccountCode"> </a></td><td>Delete Account Code (0111)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for that the account was deleted from the file and gives the reason.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DischargeDisposition<a name="conceptdomains-DischargeDisposition"> </a></td><td>Discharge Disposition (0112)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the disposition of the patient at time of discharge (i.e., discharged to home, expired, etc.).  No suggested values.  In the US, this field should use the Official Uniform Billing (UB) 04 2008 numeric codes found on form locator 17.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DischargedToLocation<a name="conceptdomains-DischargedToLocation"> </a></td><td>Discharged to Location (0113)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the healthcare facility to which the patient was discharged.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DietType<a name="conceptdomains-DietType"> </a></td><td>Diet Type (0114)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a special diet type for a patient.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ServicingFacilities<a name="conceptdomains-ServicingFacilities"> </a></td><td>Servicing Facilities (0115)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the healthcare facility with which this visit is associated in a multiple facility environment.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BedStatus<a name="conceptdomains-BedStatus"> </a></td><td>Bed Status (0116)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AccountStatus<a name="conceptdomains-AccountStatus"> </a></td><td>Account Status (0117)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the account status.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MajorDiagnosticCategory<a name="conceptdomains-MajorDiagnosticCategory"> </a></td><td>Major Diagnostic Category (0118)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the major diagnostic category.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OrderControlCodes<a name="conceptdomains-OrderControlCodes"> </a></td><td>Order Control Codes (0119)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which are used to determine the function of the order segment.  Depending on the message, the action specified by one of these control codes may refer to an order or an individual service.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ResponseFlag<a name="conceptdomains-ResponseFlag"> </a></td><td>Response Flag (0121)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values allowing the placer (sending) application to determine the amount of information to be returned from the filler.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ChargeType<a name="conceptdomains-ChargeType"> </a></td><td>Charge Type (0122)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for someone or something other than the patient to be billed for a service.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ResultStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ResultStatus"> </a></td><td>Result Status (0123)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a status of results for an order.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransportationMode<a name="conceptdomains-TransportationMode"> </a></td><td>Transportation Mode (0124)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for how (or whether) to transport a patient, when applicable, for an ordered service.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ValueType<a name="conceptdomains-ValueType"> </a></td><td>Value Type (0125)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the format of the observation value in the Observation Result (OBX).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">QuantityLimitedRequest<a name="conceptdomains-QuantityLimitedRequest"> </a></td><td>Quantity Limited Request (0126)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the maximum length of a query response that can be accepted by a requesting system, and are expressed as units of mesaure of query response objects.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AllergenType<a name="conceptdomains-AllergenType"> </a></td><td>Allergen Type (0127)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values fora classification of general allergy categories (drug, food, pollen, etc.).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AllergySeverity<a name="conceptdomains-AllergySeverity"> </a></td><td>Allergy Severity (0128)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the general severity of an allergy.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AccommodationCode<a name="conceptdomains-AccommodationCode"> </a></td><td>Accommodation Code (0129)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the fiancial accommodation type of the bed or room which implies the rate to be used when occupied by a patient under specific medical conditions, which determines how it is billed.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VisitUserCode<a name="conceptdomains-VisitUserCode"> </a></td><td>Visit User Code (0130)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for categories of a patient's visit with respect to an individual institution's needs, and is expected to be different on a site-specific basis.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContactRole<a name="conceptdomains-ContactRole"> </a></td><td>Contact Role (0131)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a relationship role that the next of kin/associated parties plays with regard to a patient. Also used in referrals, for example, it may be necessary to identify the contact representative at the clinic that issued a referral.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransactionCode<a name="conceptdomains-TransactionCode"> </a></td><td>Transaction Code (0132)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that are used by an institution for the purpose of uniquely identifying a transaction based on the Transaction Type.  For example, procedure, supply item, or test for charges; or to identify the payment medium for payments.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AssignmentOfBenefits<a name="conceptdomains-AssignmentOfBenefits"> </a></td><td>Assignment of Benefits (0135)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which indicate whether an insured person agreed to assign the insurance benefits to a healthcare provider.  If so, the insurance will pay the provider directly.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Yes/noIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-Yes.47noIndicator"> </a></td><td>Yes/no Indicator (0136)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for either Yes or No used in fields containing binary answers generally user-specified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MailClaimParty<a name="conceptdomains-MailClaimParty"> </a></td><td>Mail Claim Party (0137)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a party to which a claim should be mailed when claims are sent by mail.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EmployerInformationData<a name="conceptdomains-EmployerInformationData"> </a></td><td>Employer Information Data (0139)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the required employer information data for UB82 form locator 71.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MilitaryService<a name="conceptdomains-MilitaryService"> </a></td><td>Military Service (0140)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the military branch.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MilitaryRank/grade<a name="conceptdomains-MilitaryRank.47grade"> </a></td><td>Military Rank/Grade (0141)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the military rank/grade of the patient.
Australia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_Defence_Force_ranks
Canada: http://www.forces.gc.ca/en/honours-history-badges-insignia/rank.page
United States: published in the Defense Travel Administrator's Manual, Appendix M: Military Rank/Civilian Pay Grade Abbreviations and Service Agency Names, http://www.defensetravel.dod.mil/Docs/Training/DTA_App_M.pdf</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MilitaryStatus<a name="conceptdomains-MilitaryStatus"> </a></td><td>Military Status (0142)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the military status of the patient.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Non-coveredInsuranceCode<a name="conceptdomains-Non-coveredInsuranceCode"> </a></td><td>Non-covered Insurance Code (0143)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the reason a service is not covered.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EligibilitySource<a name="conceptdomains-EligibilitySource"> </a></td><td>Eligibility Source (0144)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the source of information about the insured's eligibility for benefits.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RoomType<a name="conceptdomains-RoomType"> </a></td><td>Room Type (0145)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the room type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AmountType<a name="conceptdomains-AmountType"> </a></td><td>Amount Type (0146)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for amount quantity type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PolicyType<a name="conceptdomains-PolicyType"> </a></td><td>Policy Type (0147)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the policy type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MoneyOrPercentageIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-MoneyOrPercentageIndicator"> </a></td><td>Money or Percentage Indicator (0148)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the amount is currency or a percentage.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DayType<a name="conceptdomains-DayType"> </a></td><td>Day Type (0149)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the days are denied, pending or approved.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CertificationPatientType<a name="conceptdomains-CertificationPatientType"> </a></td><td>Certification Patient Type (0150)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the category or type of patient for which this certification is requested.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SecondOpinionStatus<a name="conceptdomains-SecondOpinionStatus"> </a></td><td>Second Opinion Status (0151)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the status of the second opinion.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SecondOpinionDocumentationReceived<a name="conceptdomains-SecondOpinionDocumentationReceived"> </a></td><td>Second Opinion Documentation Received (0152)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for if accompanying documentation has been received by the provider.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ValueCode<a name="conceptdomains-ValueCode"> </a></td><td>Value Code (0153)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC) code.  In the US, the codes defined in code system 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.6 nubc-ValueCode-cs are often used.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AcknowledgmentConditions<a name="conceptdomains-AcknowledgmentConditions"> </a></td><td>Accept/Application Acknowledgment Conditions (0155)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which identify conditions under which accept acknowledgments are required to be returned in response to a message, and required for enhanced acknowledgment mode.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DietCodeSpecificationType<a name="conceptdomains-DietCodeSpecificationType"> </a></td><td>Diet Code Specification Type (0159)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of diet.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TrayType<a name="conceptdomains-TrayType"> </a></td><td>Tray Type (0160)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of dietary tray.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AllowSubstitution<a name="conceptdomains-AllowSubstitution"> </a></td><td>Allow Substitution (0161)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether substitutions are allowed and, if so, the type of substitutions allowed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2RouteOfAdministration<a name="conceptdomains-V2RouteOfAdministration"> </a></td><td>Route of Administration (0162)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the route of administration.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BodySite<a name="conceptdomains-BodySite"> </a></td><td>Body Site (0163)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a body site from which a specimen is obtained.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdministrationDevice<a name="conceptdomains-AdministrationDevice"> </a></td><td>Administration Device (0164)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the mechanical device used to aid in the administration of the drug or other treatment.  Common examples are IV-sets of different types.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdministrationMethod<a name="conceptdomains-AdministrationMethod"> </a></td><td>Administration Method (0165)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the specific method requested for the administration of the drug or treatment to the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RxComponentType<a name="conceptdomains-RxComponentType"> </a></td><td>RX Component Type (0166)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the RX component type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SubstitutionStatus<a name="conceptdomains-SubstitutionStatus"> </a></td><td>Substitution Status (0167)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the substitution status.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessingPriority<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessingPriority"> </a></td><td>Processing Priority (0168)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for one or more available priorities for performing the observation or test.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReportingPriority<a name="conceptdomains-ReportingPriority"> </a></td><td>Reporting Priority (0169)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the available priorities reporting the test results when the user is asked to specify the reporting priority independent of the processing priority.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DerivedSpecimen<a name="conceptdomains-DerivedSpecimen"> </a></td><td>Derived Specimen (0170)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the parents and children for diagnostic studies, especially in microbiology, where the initial specimen (e.g., blood) is processed to produce results (e.g., the identity of the bacteria grown out of the culture).  The process also produces new &quot;specimens&quot; (e.g., pure culture of staphylococcus, and E. coli), and these are studied by a second order process (bacterial sensitivities). The parents (e.g., blood culture) and children (e.g., penicillin MIC) are identified in such cases.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Citizenship<a name="conceptdomains-Citizenship"> </a></td><td>Citizenship (0171)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the information related to a person's country citizenship.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VeteransMilitaryStatus<a name="conceptdomains-VeteransMilitaryStatus"> </a></td><td>Veterans Military Status (0172)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the military status assigned to a veteran.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CoordinationOfBenefits<a name="conceptdomains-CoordinationOfBenefits"> </a></td><td>Coordination of Benefits (0173)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether this insurance works in conjunction with other insurance plans or if it provides independent coverage and payment of benefits regardless of other insurance that might be available to the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NatureOfService_Test_Observation<a name="conceptdomains-NatureOfService_Test_Observation"> </a></td><td>Nature of Service/Test/Observation (0174)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an identification of a test battery, an entire functional procedure or study, a single test value (observation), multiple test batteries or functional procedures as an orderable unit (profile), or a single test value (observation) calculated from other independent observations, typically used as an indicator for Master Files.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MasterFileIdentifierCode<a name="conceptdomains-MasterFileIdentifierCode"> </a></td><td>Master File Identifier Code (0175)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which are represented by codes identifying HL7 Versions 2.x Master Files.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConfidentialityCode<a name="conceptdomains-ConfidentialityCode"> </a></td><td>Confidentiality Code (0177)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the degree to which special confidentiality protection should be applied to the observation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>2</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">  x_BasicConfidentialityKind<a name="conceptdomains-x_BasicConfidentialityKind"> </a></td><td>x_BasicConfidentialityKind</td><td><div><p>Domain of possible values for basic confidentiality, as used and defined in the CDA base R2 standard.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>Violates ConceptDomain naming rules, and appears to be an erroneous error using the value set name as the concept domain name.</td><td>cda</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">FileLevelEventCode<a name="conceptdomains-FileLevelEventCode"> </a></td><td>File Level Event Code (0178)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for file-level events for master files.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2ResponseLevel<a name="conceptdomains-V2ResponseLevel"> </a></td><td>Response Level (0179)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for application response levels defined for a given Master File Message at the MFE segment level, and used for MFN-Master File Notification message.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MasterfileActionCode<a name="conceptdomains-MasterfileActionCode"> </a></td><td>Record-level Event Code (0180)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a record-level event for a master file record.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MfnRecord-levelErrorReturn<a name="conceptdomains-MfnRecord-levelErrorReturn"> </a></td><td>MFN Record-level Error Return (0181)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the status of the requested update.  Site-defined table, specific to each master file being updated via this transaction.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">StaffType<a name="conceptdomains-StaffType"> </a></td><td>Staff type (0182)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the staff person's sex.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Active/Inactive<a name="conceptdomains-Active.47Inactive"> </a></td><td>Active/Inactive (0183)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether a person is currently a valid staff member.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Department<a name="conceptdomains-Department"> </a></td><td>Department (0184)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the institution department to which this person reports or belongs.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PreferredMethodOfContact<a name="conceptdomains-PreferredMethodOfContact"> </a></td><td>Preferred Method of Contact (0185)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for which of a group of multiple phone numbers is the preferred method of contact for this person.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PractitionerCategory<a name="conceptdomains-PractitionerCategory"> </a></td><td>Practitioner Category (0186)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the category of practitioner.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProviderBilling<a name="conceptdomains-ProviderBilling"> </a></td><td>Provider Billing (0187)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for how provider services are billed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EthnicGroup<a name="conceptdomains-EthnicGroup"> </a></td><td>Ethnic Group (0189)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values further defining a patient's ancestry.  In the US, a current use is to use these codes to report ethnicity in line with US federal standards for Hispanic origin.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AddressType<a name="conceptdomains-AddressType"> </a></td><td>Address Type (0190)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for types or kinds of addresses.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TypeOfReferencedData<a name="conceptdomains-TypeOfReferencedData"> </a></td><td>Type of Referenced Data (0191)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values declaring the general type of media data that is encoded.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AmountClass<a name="conceptdomains-AmountClass"> </a></td><td>Amount Class (0193)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the amount quantity class.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NameType<a name="conceptdomains-NameType"> </a></td><td>Name Type (0200)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for types of names for persons.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TelecommunicationUseCode<a name="conceptdomains-TelecommunicationUseCode"> </a></td><td>Telecommunication Use Code (0201)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for specifying a specific use of a telecommunication number.  Best practice is to use this concept whenever a telecommunication number or access string is specified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TelecommunicationEquipmentType<a name="conceptdomains-TelecommunicationEquipmentType"> </a></td><td>Telecommunication Equipment Type (0202)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values  for specifying a type of telecommunication equipment.  Best practice is to use this concept whenever a telecommunication number or access string for particular equipment is specified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IdentifierType<a name="conceptdomains-IdentifierType"> </a></td><td>Identifier Type (0203)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of identifier.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OrganizationalNameType<a name="conceptdomains-OrganizationalNameType"> </a></td><td>Organizational Name Type (0204)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the type of name for an organization i.e., legal name, display name.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PriceType<a name="conceptdomains-PriceType"> </a></td><td>Price Type (0205)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to identify the intent for the dollar amount on a pricing transaction.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SegmentActionCode<a name="conceptdomains-SegmentActionCode"> </a></td><td>Segment Action Code (0206)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for actions to be applied for segments when an HL7 version 2 interface is operating in &quot;action code mode&quot; (a kind of update mode in the Standard).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2ProcessingMode<a name="conceptdomains-V2ProcessingMode"> </a></td><td>Processing Mode (0207)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate an archival process or an initial load process.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">QueryResponseStatus<a name="conceptdomains-QueryResponseStatus"> </a></td><td>Query Response Status (0208)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values defining precise response status concepts in support of HL7 Version 2 query messaging.  It is commonly used to indicate no data is found that matches the query parameters, but no error.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2RelationalOperator<a name="conceptdomains-V2RelationalOperator"> </a></td><td>Relational Operator (0209)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to define the relationship between HL7 segment field names identified in a query construct.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RelationalConjunction<a name="conceptdomains-RelationalConjunction"> </a></td><td>Relational Conjunction (0210)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values used with relational operator values to group more than one segment field name.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AlternateCharacterSets<a name="conceptdomains-AlternateCharacterSets"> </a></td><td>Alternate Character Sets (0211)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify one of a number of possible standard alternate character sets for a message, either single-byte or double-byte.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Nationality<a name="conceptdomains-Nationality"> </a></td><td>Nationality (0212)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the nation or national grouping to which the person belongs.  This information may be different from a person’s citizenship in countries in which multiple nationalities are recognized (for example, Spain: Basque, Catalan, etc.).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PurgeStatusCode<a name="conceptdomains-PurgeStatusCode"> </a></td><td>Purge Status Code (0213)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define the state of a visit relative to its place in a purge workflow.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecialProgramCode<a name="conceptdomains-SpecialProgramCode"> </a></td><td>Special Program Code (0214)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that record a health insurance program required for healthcare visit reimbursement.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PublicityCode<a name="conceptdomains-PublicityCode"> </a></td><td>Publicity Code (0215)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a level of publicity of information about a patient for a specific visit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PatientStatusCode<a name="conceptdomains-PatientStatusCode"> </a></td><td>Patient Status Code (0216)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define the state of a care episode for a patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VisitPriorityCode<a name="conceptdomains-VisitPriorityCode"> </a></td><td>Visit Priority Code (0217)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define a relative level of urgency applied to a patient visit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PatientChargeAdjustment<a name="conceptdomains-PatientChargeAdjustment"> </a></td><td>Patient Charge Adjustment (0218)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate which adjustments should be made to a guarantor’s charges.  For example, when a hospital agrees to adjust a guarantor’s charges to a sliding scale.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RecurringServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-RecurringServiceCode"> </a></td><td>Recurring Service Code (0219)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate whether a treatment is continuous.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2LivingArrangement<a name="conceptdomains-V2LivingArrangement"> </a></td><td>Living Arrangement (0220)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values characterizing the situation that patient-associated parties live in at their residential address.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContactReason<a name="conceptdomains-ContactReason"> </a></td><td>Contact Reason (0222)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate a reason for contacting a guarantor, for example, to phone a guarantor if payments are late.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LivingDependency<a name="conceptdomains-LivingDependency"> </a></td><td>Living Dependency (0223)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying specific living conditions (e.g., spouse dependent on patient, walk-up) that are relevant to an evaluation of the patient's healthcare needs.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransportArranged<a name="conceptdomains-TransportArranged"> </a></td><td>Transport Arranged (0224)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values defining whether patient transportation preparations are in place.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EscortRequired<a name="conceptdomains-EscortRequired"> </a></td><td>Escort Required (0225)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values indicating whether a patient must be accompanied while travelling to a diagnostic service department.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ManufacturersOfVaccines<a name="conceptdomains-ManufacturersOfVaccines"> </a></td><td>Manufacturers of Vaccines (code=MVX) (0227)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the organization that manufactures a vaccine. The values are maintained by the US Centers of Disease Control.  Note that the source of truth for these code values are maintained by the CDC, and the code system may be accessed at URL: https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/SearchCodeSystems_search.action?searchOptions.searchText=PH_ManufacturersOfVaccinesMVX_CDC_NIP.  The value set is also maintained by the CDC, and may be accessed at URL: https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/SearchValueSets_search.action?searchOptions.searchText=PHVS_ManufacturersOfVaccinesMVX_CDC_NIP</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DiagnosisClassification<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosisClassification"> </a></td><td>Diagnosis Classification (0228)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that classify whether a patient visit can be related to a diagnosis.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DrgPayor<a name="conceptdomains-DrgPayor"> </a></td><td>DRG Payor (0229)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a Diagnostic Resource Group Payor.  US Realm.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcedureFunctionalType<a name="conceptdomains-ProcedureFunctionalType"> </a></td><td>Procedure Functional Type (0230)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that classify a procedure.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">StudentStatus<a name="conceptdomains-StudentStatus"> </a></td><td>Student Status (0231)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that designate whether a guarantor is a full or part time student.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InsuranceCompanyContactReason<a name="conceptdomains-InsuranceCompanyContactReason"> </a></td><td>- Insurance Company Contact Reason (0232)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe why an insurance company has been contacted.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Non-concurCode_Description<a name="conceptdomains-Non-concurCode_Description"> </a></td><td>Non-Concur Code/Description (0233)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a non-concur code and description for a denied request, used in insurance claims processing.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReportTiming<a name="conceptdomains-ReportTiming"> </a></td><td>Report Timing (0234)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to identify the time span of a report or the reason for a report sent to a regulatory agency.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReportSource<a name="conceptdomains-ReportSource"> </a></td><td>Report Source (0235)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to identify where a report sender learned about an event.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventReportedTo<a name="conceptdomains-EventReportedTo"> </a></td><td>Event Reported To (0236)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to identify the type of entity to which the event has been reported.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventQualification<a name="conceptdomains-EventQualification"> </a></td><td>Event Qualification (0237)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to qualify an event related to a product experience.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventSeriousness<a name="conceptdomains-EventSeriousness"> </a></td><td>Event Seriousness (0238)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to a sender to designate an event as serious or significant.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventExpected<a name="conceptdomains-EventExpected"> </a></td><td>Event Expected (0239)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to communicate whether an event has been judged to be expected or unexpected.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventConsequence<a name="conceptdomains-EventConsequence"> </a></td><td>Event Consequence (0240)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to describe the impact of an event on a patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PatientOutcome<a name="conceptdomains-PatientOutcome"> </a></td><td>Patient Outcome (0241)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to describe the overall state of a patient as a result of patient care.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PrimaryObserversQualification<a name="conceptdomains-PrimaryObserversQualification"> </a></td><td>Primary Observer's Qualification (0242)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to provide a general description of the kind of health care professional who provided the primary observation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IdentityMayBeDivulged<a name="conceptdomains-IdentityMayBeDivulged"> </a></td><td>Identity May Be Divulged (0243)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to define whether the primary observer has given permission for their identification information to be provided to a product manufacturer.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SingleUseDevice<a name="conceptdomains-SingleUseDevice"> </a></td><td>Single Use Device (0244)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate whether a product is designed for a single use.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProductProblem<a name="conceptdomains-ProductProblem"> </a></td><td>Product Problem (0245)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate if a product problem would exist if a product malfunction could lead to death or serious injury.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProductAvailableForInspection<a name="conceptdomains-ProductAvailableForInspection"> </a></td><td>Product Available for Inspection (0246)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate that the product is available for analysis. No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">StatusOfEvaluation<a name="conceptdomains-StatusOfEvaluation"> </a></td><td>Status of Evaluation (0247)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describes the status of product evaluation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProductSource<a name="conceptdomains-ProductSource"> </a></td><td>Product Source (0248)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to describe the evaluation state of a product identified in an incident.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">GenericProduct<a name="conceptdomains-GenericProduct"> </a></td><td>Generic Product (0249)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate whether the product used is a generic or a branded product. No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RelatednessAssessment<a name="conceptdomains-RelatednessAssessment"> </a></td><td>Relatedness Assessment (0250)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to provide an estimate of whether an issue with a  product was the cause of an event.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ActionTakenInResponseToTheEvent<a name="conceptdomains-ActionTakenInResponseToTheEvent"> </a></td><td>Action Taken in Response to the Event (0251)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to define the action taken as a result of an event related to a product issue.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CausalityObservations<a name="conceptdomains-CausalityObservations"> </a></td><td>Causality Observations (0252)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to record event observations regarding what may have caused a product related event.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IndirectExposureMechanism<a name="conceptdomains-IndirectExposureMechanism"> </a></td><td>Indirect Exposure Mechanism (0253)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to identify the mechanism of product transmission when the product has not been directly applied to the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">KindOfQuantity<a name="conceptdomains-KindOfQuantity"> </a></td><td>Kind of Quantity (0254)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe the underlying kind of property represented by an observation.  The categories distinguish concentrations from total amounts, molar concentrations from mass concentrations, partial pressures from colors, and so forth.  These are discussed more fully in the LOINC Users' Manual.   They are derived from the approach described in 1995 edition of the IUPAC Silver Book.  These distinctions are used in IUPAC and LOINC standard codes.    The distinctions of true quantities in this table are based primarily on dimensional analyses. The table contains a number of &quot;families,&quot; those related to simple counts (number, number concentration, etc.), to mass (mass, mass concentration, etc.), to enzyme activity (catalytic content, catalytic concentration, etc.), and molar or equivalents (substance content, substance concentration).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DurationCategories<a name="conceptdomains-DurationCategories"> </a></td><td>Duration Categories (0255)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that classify an observation definition as intended to measure a patient's state at a point in time.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TimeDelayPostChallenge<a name="conceptdomains-TimeDelayPostChallenge"> </a></td><td>Time Delay Post Challenge (0256)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to classify an observation definition as being a component of a challenge test.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NatureOfChallenge<a name="conceptdomains-NatureOfChallenge"> </a></td><td>Nature of Challenge (0257)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to further describe an observation definition that is characterized as a challenge observation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RelationshipModifier<a name="conceptdomains-RelationshipModifier"> </a></td><td>Relationship Modifier (0258)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to an observation definition to describe the subject of an observation in relation to a patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Modality<a name="conceptdomains-Modality"> </a></td><td>Modality (0259)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define the imaging apparatus expected to be used to acquire an observation.  This table has been removed from the standard as of 2.7 in favor of table 0910.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PatientLocationType<a name="conceptdomains-PatientLocationType"> </a></td><td>Patient Location Type (0260)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the kind of location described in the location definition.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationEquipment<a name="conceptdomains-LocationEquipment"> </a></td><td>Location Equipment (0261)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the equipment available in a location definition identified as a room or bed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PrivacyLevel<a name="conceptdomains-PrivacyLevel"> </a></td><td>Privacy Level (0262)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the level of privacy a patient will be afforded when assigned to this location definition.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LevelOfCare<a name="conceptdomains-LevelOfCare"> </a></td><td>Level of Care (0263)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the level of care a patient may be afforded when assigned to this location definition.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationDepartment<a name="conceptdomains-LocationDepartment"> </a></td><td>Location Department (0264)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values used to specify the institution’s department to which a location belongs, or its cost center.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecialtyType<a name="conceptdomains-SpecialtyType"> </a></td><td>Specialty Type (0265)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the specialty of the care professional who is supported when using this location definition.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DaysOfTheWeek<a name="conceptdomains-DaysOfTheWeek"> </a></td><td>Days of the Week (0267)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to identify the day(s) of the week when a location may be scheduled for appointments.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Override<a name="conceptdomains-Override"> </a></td><td>Override (0268)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define whether a Charge Description Master description may be overridden or if it must be overridden.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ChargeOnIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-ChargeOnIndicator"> </a></td><td>Charge On Indicator (0269)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define the event upon which a charge should be generated.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2DocumentType<a name="conceptdomains-V2DocumentType"> </a></td><td>Document Type (0270)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the kind of patient document.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DocumentCompletionStatus<a name="conceptdomains-DocumentCompletionStatus"> </a></td><td>Document Completion Status (0271)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to record the state of a document in a workflow.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DocumentConfidentialityStatus<a name="conceptdomains-DocumentConfidentialityStatus"> </a></td><td>Document Confidentiality Status (0272)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the degree to which special confidentiality protection should be applied to  information.  The assignment of data elements to these categories is left to the discretion of the healthcare organization.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DocumentAvailabilityStatus<a name="conceptdomains-DocumentAvailabilityStatus"> </a></td><td>Document Availability Status (0273)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to define whether a patient document is appropriate or available for use in patient care.</p>
