</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DocumentStorageStatus<a name="conceptdomains-DocumentStorageStatus"> </a></td><td>Document Storage Status (0275)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to describe the availability of a document in relation to the type of storage.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AppointmentReasonCodes<a name="conceptdomains-AppointmentReasonCodes"> </a></td><td>Appointment reason codes (0276)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe the kind of appointment or the reason why an appointment has been scheduled.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AppointmentTypeCodes<a name="conceptdomains-AppointmentTypeCodes"> </a></td><td>Appointment Type Codes (0277)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that an appointment request to describe the kind of appointment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">FillerStatusCodes<a name="conceptdomains-FillerStatusCodes"> </a></td><td>Filler status codes (0278)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe an appointment status from the perspective of the entity assigned to fulfill the appointment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AllowSubstitutionCodes<a name="conceptdomains-AllowSubstitutionCodes"> </a></td><td>Allow Substitution Codes (0279)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate whether the appointment resource may be substituted for another by the entity assigned to fulfill the appointment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralPriority<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralPriority"> </a></td><td>Referral Priority (0280)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that designate the urgency of a  referral.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralType<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralType"> </a></td><td>Referral Type (0281)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the general category of healthcare professional desired to satisfy a referral.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralDisposition<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralDisposition"> </a></td><td>Referral Disposition (0282)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the expected response from the healthcare professional receiving a referral.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralStatus"> </a></td><td>Referral Status (0283)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define the state of a  referral.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralCategory<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralCategory"> </a></td><td>Referral Category (0284)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe the patient care setting where a referral should take place.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InsuranceCompanyIdCodes<a name="conceptdomains-InsuranceCompanyIdCodes"> </a></td><td>Insurance Company ID Codes (0285)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the identification of the insurance company or other entity that administers the authorizing coverage plan.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralProviderRole<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralProviderRole"> </a></td><td>Provider Role (0286)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define the relationship between a referral recipient and a patient or between a referral initiator and a patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Problem_GoalActionCode<a name="conceptdomains-Problem_GoalActionCode"> </a></td><td>Problem/Goal Action Code (0287)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to Patient Care for the intent of a problem or goal.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CensusTract<a name="conceptdomains-CensusTract"> </a></td><td>Census Tract (0288)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the census tract in which the specified address resides.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">County/Parish<a name="conceptdomains-County.47Parish"> </a></td><td>County/Parish (0289)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the county or parish in which the specified address resides.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SubtypeOfReferencedData<a name="conceptdomains-SubtypeOfReferencedData"> </a></td><td>Subtype of Referenced Data (0291)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a subset of the media subtypes of binary data that are encoded in an ascii structure or stream.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VaccinesAdministered<a name="conceptdomains-VaccinesAdministered"> </a></td><td>Vaccines Administered (0292)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the administered vaccines.   The values are maintained by the US Centers of Disease Control..  The code system is maintained by the CDC, and may be found at URL;  https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewCodeSystem.action?id=2.16.840.1.113883.12.292
The value set is maintained by the CDC and may be found at URL: https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=ABDEE003-77C3-48E7-B941-EBF92B6B81FC</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BillingCategory<a name="conceptdomains-BillingCategory"> </a></td><td>Billing Category (0293)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the billing category codes for any classification systems needed, for example, general ledger codes and UB92 categories.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TimeSelectionCriteriaParameterClassCodes<a name="conceptdomains-TimeSelectionCriteriaParameterClassCodes"> </a></td><td>Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes (0294)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe acceptable start and end times, as well as days of the week, for appointment or resource scheduling.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Handicap<a name="conceptdomains-Handicap"> </a></td><td>Handicap (0295)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an associated party's disability.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PrimaryLanguage<a name="conceptdomains-PrimaryLanguage"> </a></td><td>Primary Language (0296)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the patient's primary language.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CnIdSource<a name="conceptdomains-CnIdSource"> </a></td><td>CN ID Source (0297)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the CN identification source.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CpRangeType<a name="conceptdomains-CpRangeType"> </a></td><td>CP Range Type (0298)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify whether a composite price range is experssed as a flat rate or a percentage.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Encoding<a name="conceptdomains-Encoding"> </a></td><td>Encoding (0299)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the type of encoding used to represent successive octets of binary data as displayable ASCII characters.  These are defined by IETF; more information may be found at https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1521.txt</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NamespaceId<a name="conceptdomains-NamespaceId"> </a></td><td>Namespace ID (0300)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the unique name of the system that stores the data.   It was previously named the Application ID.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">UniversalIdType<a name="conceptdomains-UniversalIdType"> </a></td><td>Universal ID Type (0301)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of UID (Universal Identifier).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PointOfCare<a name="conceptdomains-PointOfCare"> </a></td><td>Point of Care (0302)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the point where patient care is administered.  It is conditional on Person Location Type (e.g., nursing unit or department or clinic).   No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Room<a name="conceptdomains-Room"> </a></td><td>Room (0303)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the patient's room.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Bed<a name="conceptdomains-Bed"> </a></td><td>Bed (0304)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the patient's bed.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PersonLocationType<a name="conceptdomains-PersonLocationType"> </a></td><td>Person Location Type (0305)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the categorization of the person's location.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationStatus<a name="conceptdomains-LocationStatus"> </a></td><td>Location Status (0306)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the status or availability of the location, such as the bed status.   No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Building<a name="conceptdomains-Building"> </a></td><td>Building (0307)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the building where the person is located.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Floor<a name="conceptdomains-Floor"> </a></td><td>Floor (0308)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the floor where the person is located.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CoverageType<a name="conceptdomains-CoverageType"> </a></td><td>Coverage Type (0309)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of insurance coverage or what types of services are covered for the purposes of a billing system.  For example, a physician billing system will only want to receive insurance information for plans that cover physician/professional charges.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">JobStatus<a name="conceptdomains-JobStatus"> </a></td><td>Job Status (0311)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a next of kin/associated party's job status.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PolicyScope<a name="conceptdomains-PolicyScope"> </a></td><td>Policy Scope (0312)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the extent of insurance coverage for a participating member (e.g., single, family, etc.).  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PolicySource<a name="conceptdomains-PolicySource"> </a></td><td>Policy Source (0313)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for how an insurance policy is established.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LivingWillCode<a name="conceptdomains-LivingWillCode"> </a></td><td>Living Will Code (0315)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether or not the patient has a living will and, if so, whether a copy fo the living will is on file at the healthcare facility.  If the patient does not have a living will, the value of this field indicates whether the patient was provided information on living wills.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OrganDonorCode<a name="conceptdomains-OrganDonorCode"> </a></td><td>Organ Donor Code (0316)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the patient wants to donate his/her organs and whether an organ donor card or similar documentation is on file with the healthcare organization.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Annotations<a name="conceptdomains-Annotations"> </a></td><td>Annotations (0317)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the coded entry associated with a given point in time during the waveform recording.  Note codes beyond 9903 may exist; extensions to this table may be done by incrementing the code value.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DepartmentCostCenter<a name="conceptdomains-DepartmentCostCenter"> </a></td><td>Department Cost Center (0319)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the accounting code that identifies the department in order to charge for the item.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ItemNaturalAccountCode<a name="conceptdomains-ItemNaturalAccountCode"> </a></td><td>Item Natural Account Code (0320)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying an item in order to charge for the item.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DispenseMethod<a name="conceptdomains-DispenseMethod"> </a></td><td>Dispense Method (0321)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the method by which treatment is dispensed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CompletionStatus<a name="conceptdomains-CompletionStatus"> </a></td><td>Completion Status (0322)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the status of the treatment administration event.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationCharacteristicId<a name="conceptdomains-LocationCharacteristicId"> </a></td><td>Location Characteristic ID (0324)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an identifier code to show which characteristic is being communicated with the segment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationRelationshipId<a name="conceptdomains-LocationRelationshipId"> </a></td><td>Location Relationship ID (0325)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an identifier code to show which relationship is being communicated with the segment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VisitIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-VisitIndicator"> </a></td><td>Visit Indicator (0326)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the level on which data are being sent.  It is the indicator used to send data at two levels, visit and account.  HL7 recommends sending an &quot;A&quot; or no value when the data in the message are at the account level or &quot;V&quot; to indicate that the data sent in the message are at the visit level.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">JobCode<a name="conceptdomains-JobCode"> </a></td><td>Job Code (0327)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a person's job code.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EmployeeClassification<a name="conceptdomains-EmployeeClassification"> </a></td><td>Employee Classification (0328)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a person's employee classification.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">QuantityMethod<a name="conceptdomains-QuantityMethod"> </a></td><td>Quantity Method (0329)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the method by which the quantity distributed is measured.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MarketingBasis<a name="conceptdomains-MarketingBasis"> </a></td><td>Marketing Basis (0330)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the basis for marketing approval.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">FacilityType<a name="conceptdomains-FacilityType"> </a></td><td>Facility Type (0331)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the type of facility.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SourceType<a name="conceptdomains-SourceType"> </a></td><td>Source Type (0332)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to indicate (in certain systems) whether a lower level source identifier is an initiate or accept type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DriversLicenseIssuingAuthority<a name="conceptdomains-DriversLicenseIssuingAuthority"> </a></td><td>Driver's License Issuing Authority (0333)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the driver's license issuing authority.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DisabledPersonCode<a name="conceptdomains-DisabledPersonCode"> </a></td><td>Disabled Person Code (0334)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify to which person the disability information relates in the message.  For example, if the value is PT, the disability information relates to the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RepeatPattern<a name="conceptdomains-RepeatPattern"> </a></td><td>Repeat Pattern (0335)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the interval between repeated services. See the Comment/Usage Note in the table below, as the table contains both precoordinated codes that may be used in an HL7 field or component and also explanatory patterns illustrating the syntax used to construct expressions using the codes and other modifiers.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralReason<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralReason"> </a></td><td>Referral Reason (0336)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason for which the referral will take place.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CertificationStatus<a name="conceptdomains-CertificationStatus"> </a></td><td>Certification Status (0337)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the status of the practitioner's speciality certification.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PractitionerIdNumberType<a name="conceptdomains-PractitionerIdNumberType"> </a></td><td>Practitioner ID Number Type (0338)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of number used for the practitioner identification.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdvancedBeneficiaryNoticeCode<a name="conceptdomains-AdvancedBeneficiaryNoticeCode"> </a></td><td>Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code (0339)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the status of the patient's or the patient's representative's consent for responsibility to pay for potentially uninsured services. This element was introduced to satisfy CMS Medical Necessity requirements for outpatient services in the United States. Includes concepts such as (a) whether the associated diagnosis codes for the service are subject to medical necessity procedures, (b) whether, for this type of service, the patient has been informed that they may be responsible for payment for the service, and (c) whether the patient agrees to be billed for this service.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcedureCodeModifier<a name="conceptdomains-ProcedureCodeModifier"> </a></td><td>Procedure Code Modifier (0340)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a procedure code modifier to a procedure code.  Procedure code modifiers are defined by regulatory agencies such as CMS and the AMA.  Multiple modifiers may be reported.  The modifiers are sequenced in priority according to user entry.  This is a requirement of the UB and the 1500 claim forms.  Multiple modifiers are allowed and the order placed on the form affects reimbursement.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">GuarantorCreditRatingCode<a name="conceptdomains-GuarantorCreditRatingCode"> </a></td><td>Guarantor Credit Rating Code (0341)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a guarantor's credit rating.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MilitaryRecipient<a name="conceptdomains-MilitaryRecipient"> </a></td><td>Military Recipient (0342)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a designation as a military recipient.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MilitaryHandicappedProgramCode<a name="conceptdomains-MilitaryHandicappedProgramCode"> </a></td><td>Military Handicapped Program Code (0343)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a military program for the handicapped in which a patient is enrolled.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Patient'sRelationshipToInsured<a name="conceptdomains-Patient.39sRelationshipToInsured"> </a></td><td>Patient's Relationship to Insured (0344)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the relationship of the patient to the insured, as defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AppealReason<a name="conceptdomains-AppealReason"> </a></td><td>Appeal Reason (0345)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify  reasons an appeal was made on a non-concur for certification.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CertificationAgency<a name="conceptdomains-CertificationAgency"> </a></td><td>Certification Agency (0346)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a certification agency.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CountrySubdivision<a name="conceptdomains-CountrySubdivision"> </a></td><td>State/Province (0347)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the names of the principal country subdivisions (e.g., provinces or states).  The values in the table are country specific.  For example, in the US, the Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) alpha codes may be used by local agreement.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OccurrenceCode<a name="conceptdomains-OccurrenceCode"> </a></td><td>Occurrence Code (0350)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the event or occurrence relating to a bill that may affect payer processing.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OccurrenceSpan<a name="conceptdomains-OccurrenceSpan"> </a></td><td>Occurrence Span (0351)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify an event that relates to the payment of a claim.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CweStatuses<a name="conceptdomains-CweStatuses"> </a></td><td>CWE statuses (0353)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that represent an exception identifier code; that is, a code that is not defined in the value set (either model or site-extended).  These are occationsally referred to a 'flavors of null' although this set of concepts is specific to the CWE datatype used in Version 2 messaging, and the codes may be used in the 'identifier' component of the 'triplets' in that datatype.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MessageStructure<a name="conceptdomains-MessageStructure"> </a></td><td>Message Structure (0354)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values of abstract message structure codes. Each code identifies a specific message structure abstract syntax as published in the HL7 Version 2 standard.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PrimaryKeyValueType<a name="conceptdomains-PrimaryKeyValueType"> </a></td><td>Primary Key Value Type (0355)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the type for the master file record identifier.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AlternateCharacterSetHandlingScheme<a name="conceptdomains-AlternateCharacterSetHandlingScheme"> </a></td><td>Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme (0356)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the scheme used when any alternative character sets are specified in the second or later iterations of MSH-18 Character Set, and if any special handling scheme is needed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MessageErrorConditionCodes<a name="conceptdomains-MessageErrorConditionCodes"> </a></td><td>Message Error Condition Codes (0357)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the HL7 (communications) error code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PractitionerGroup<a name="conceptdomains-PractitionerGroup"> </a></td><td>Practitioner Group (0358)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the name and/or code of a group of practitioners to which this practitioner belongs.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DiagnosisPriority<a name="conceptdomains-DiagnosisPriority"> </a></td><td>Diagnosis Priority (0359)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the significance or priority of the diagnosis code.  Note that the codes are numeric, and the number of the code represents the ordinal priority of the associated diagnosis. The predefined codes are the most common, and just a starter set, as the codes are an unbounded list; additional ranked procedures may be signified by incrementing the code value as needed.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Degree/License/Certificate<a name="conceptdomains-Degree.47License.47Certificate"> </a></td><td>Degree/License/Certificate (0360)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an educational degree (e.g., MD).  Used in the CNN datatype (names and identifiers of clinicians) in Version 2 messaging.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Application<a name="conceptdomains-Application"> </a></td><td>Application (0361)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a sending application among all other applications within the network enterprise.  The network enterprise consists of all those applications that participate in the exchange of HL7 messages within the enterprise.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Facility<a name="conceptdomains-Facility"> </a></td><td>Facility (0362)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the site-specific name for the facility used by this application.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AssigningAuthority<a name="conceptdomains-AssigningAuthority"> </a></td><td>Assigning Authority (0363)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a unique name of the system (or organization or agency or department) that creates the data.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CommentType<a name="conceptdomains-CommentType"> </a></td><td>Comment Type (0364)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the type of comment text being sent in the specific comment record.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EquipmentState<a name="conceptdomains-EquipmentState"> </a></td><td>Equipment State (0365)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the status the equipment was in at the time the transaction was initiated.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Local_RemoteControlState<a name="conceptdomains-Local_RemoteControlState"> </a></td><td>Local/Remote Control State (0366)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the current state of control associated with the equipment.   Equipment can either work autonomously ('Local' control state) or it can be controlled by another system, e.g., LAS computer ('Remote' control state).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AlertLevel<a name="conceptdomains-AlertLevel"> </a></td><td>Alert Level (0367)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the highest level of the alert state (e.g.,highest alert severity) that is associated with the indicated equipment (e.g. processing event, inventory event, QC event).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RemoteControlCommand<a name="conceptdomains-RemoteControlCommand"> </a></td><td>Remote Control Command (0368)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the comment the component is to initiate.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenRole<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenRole"> </a></td><td>Specimen Role (0369)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the role of a sample.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContainerStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ContainerStatus"> </a></td><td>Container Status (0370)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the status of the unique container in which the specimen resides at the time the transaction was initiated.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Additive/Preservative<a name="conceptdomains-Additive.47Preservative"> </a></td><td>Additive/Preservative (0371)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for any additive introduced to the specimen before or at the time of collection.  These additives may be introduced in order to preserve, maintain or enhance the particular nature or component of the specimen.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenComponent<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenComponent"> </a></td><td>Specimen Component (0372)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the specimen component, e.g., supernatant, sediment, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Treatment<a name="conceptdomains-Treatment"> </a></td><td>Treatment (0373)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the specimen treatment performed during lab processing.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SystemInducedContaminants<a name="conceptdomains-SystemInducedContaminants"> </a></td><td>System Induced Contaminants (0374)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the specimen contaminant identifier associated with the specimen in the container.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ArtificialBlood<a name="conceptdomains-ArtificialBlood"> </a></td><td>Artificial Blood (0375)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the artificial blood identifier associated with the specimen.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecialHandlingCode<a name="conceptdomains-SpecialHandlingCode"> </a></td><td>Special Handling Code (0376)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values describing how a specimen and/or container needs to be handled from the time of collection through the initiation of testing.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OtherEnvironmentalFactors<a name="conceptdomains-OtherEnvironmentalFactors"> </a></td><td>Other Environmental Factors (0377)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the other environmental factors associated with the specimen in a specific container, e.g., atmospheric exposure.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CarrierType<a name="conceptdomains-CarrierType"> </a></td><td>Carrier Type (0378)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a type of carrier.  Because the geometry can be different, the carrier type should, if possible, express the number of positions in the carrier.  The definition assumes hierarchical nesting using the following phrases: container is located in a carrier, carrier is located in a tray.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContainerTrayType<a name="conceptdomains-ContainerTrayType"> </a></td><td>Tray Type (0379)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a type of tray.  Because the geometry can be different, the tray type should, if possible, express the number of positions in the tray.  The definition assumes hierarchical nesting using the following phrases: container is located in a carrier, carrier is located in a tray.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SeparatorType<a name="conceptdomains-SeparatorType"> </a></td><td>Separator Type (0380)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a type of separator being used (e.g., a gel separator in a container - not to be confused with the communication separators).  It is recommended the first table entry be &quot;NO&quot; meaning &quot;No Separator&quot;.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CapType<a name="conceptdomains-CapType"> </a></td><td>Cap Type (0381)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a type of cap that is to be used with a container for decapping, piercing or other mechanisms.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DrugInterference<a name="conceptdomains-DrugInterference"> </a></td><td>Drug Interference (0382)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a drug interference  associated with a specimen.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SubstanceStatus<a name="conceptdomains-SubstanceStatus"> </a></td><td>Substance Status (0383)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the status of the inventoried item.  The status indicates the current status of the substance.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SubstanceType<a name="conceptdomains-SubstanceType"> </a></td><td>Substance Type (0384)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the type of substance.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ManufacturerIdentifier<a name="conceptdomains-ManufacturerIdentifier"> </a></td><td>Manufacturer Identifier (0385)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a manufacturer of a substance.  Relevant external code systems may be used, e.g., HIBCC Manufacturers Labeler ID Code (LIC), UPC, NDC, etc.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SupplierIdentifier<a name="conceptdomains-SupplierIdentifier"> </a></td><td>Supplier Identifier (0386)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify a supplier of a substance.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CommandResponse<a name="conceptdomains-CommandResponse"> </a></td><td>Command Response (0387)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the response of the previously issued command.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessingType<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessingType"> </a></td><td>Processing Type (0388)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the processing type that applies to the test code.  If this attribute is omitted, then regular production is the default.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AnalyteRepeatStatus<a name="conceptdomains-AnalyteRepeatStatus"> </a></td><td>Analyte Repeat Status (0389)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the repeat status for the analyte/result (e.g. original, rerun, repeat, reflex).  The following are assumptions regarding the table values: Repeated without dilution — performed usually to confirm correctness of results (e.g., in case of results flagged as &quot;Panic&quot; or mechanical failures).  Repeated with dilution — performed usually in the case the original result exceeded the measurement range (technical limits).  Reflex test — this test is performed as the consequence of rules triggered based on other test result(s).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SegmentGroup<a name="conceptdomains-SegmentGroup"> </a></td><td>Segment Group (0391)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the optional segment groups which are to be included in a response.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MatchReason<a name="conceptdomains-MatchReason"> </a></td><td>Match Reason (0392)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying what search components (e.g., name, birthdate, social security number) of the record returned matched the original query where the responding system does not assign numeric match weights or confidence levels.  It provides a method for passing a descriptive indication of the reason a particular record was found.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MatchAlgorithms<a name="conceptdomains-MatchAlgorithms"> </a></td><td>Match Algorithms (0393)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the name or identity of the specific search algorithm to which the RCP-5 Search Confidence Threshold and the QRI-1 Candidate Confidence refer.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2ResponseModality<a name="conceptdomains-V2ResponseModality"> </a></td><td>Response Modality (0394)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying the timing and grouping of the response message(s).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2ModifyIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-V2ModifyIndicator"> </a></td><td>Modify Indicator (0395)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying whether the subscription is new or is being modified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CodingSystem<a name="conceptdomains-CodingSystem"> </a></td><td>Coding System (0396)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values of specifying the coding system.  This table is maintained outside of the published Version 2 standards, and may be found at http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/vocab/table_0396/index.cfm.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2Sequencing<a name="conceptdomains-V2Sequencing"> </a></td><td>Sequencing (0397)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying how the field or parameter will be sorted and, if sorted, whether the sort will be case sensitive (the default) or not.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContinuationStyleCode<a name="conceptdomains-ContinuationStyleCode"> </a></td><td>Continuation Style Code (0398)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values identifying whether it is a fragmented message or part of an interactive continuation message.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CountryCode<a name="conceptdomains-CountryCode"> </a></td><td>Country Code (0399)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identifies a country of origin for a message.  It will be used primarily to specify default elements, such as currency denominations. The values to be used are those of ISO 3166. The ISO 3166 table has three separate forms of the country code: HL7 specifies that the 3-character (alphabetic) form be used for the country code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">GovernmentReimbursementProgram<a name="conceptdomains-GovernmentReimbursementProgram"> </a></td><td>Government Reimbursement Program (0401)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for codes that indicate an agency that the practitioner is authorized to bill for medical services.  Existing codes only for use in the United States.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SchoolType<a name="conceptdomains-SchoolType"> </a></td><td>School Type (0402)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a categorization of an academic institution that grants a degree to a Staff Member.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LanguageAbility<a name="conceptdomains-LanguageAbility"> </a></td><td>Language Ability (0403)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for codes that indicate the ability that a Staff Member possesses with respect to the language.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LanguageProficiency<a name="conceptdomains-LanguageProficiency"> </a></td><td>Language Proficiency (0404)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which specify the level of knowledge a person possesses with respect to a language ability identified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OrganizationUnit<a name="conceptdomains-OrganizationUnit"> </a></td><td>Organization Unit (0405)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values which specify the hierarchical components of an organization unit, as defined by the institution.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ParticipantOrganizationUnitType<a name="conceptdomains-ParticipantOrganizationUnitType"> </a></td><td>Participant Organization Unit Type (0406)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the environment in which the provider acts in the role associated with the provider type, and inludes codes for venues outside of formal organized healthcare settings, such as Home. The provider environment is not the specialty for the provider.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ApplicationChangeType<a name="conceptdomains-ApplicationChangeType"> </a></td><td>Application Change Type (0409)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a type of change being requested (if NMR query) or announced (if NMD unsolicited update).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SupplementalServiceInformationValues<a name="conceptdomains-SupplementalServiceInformationValues"> </a></td><td>Supplemental Service Information Values (0411)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify supplemental service information sent between a placer system and a filler system for the universal procedure code reported in OBR-4 Universal Service ID. This specifies ordering information detail that is not available in other specific tables for fields in the OBR segment.  These might be details such as whether a study is to be done on the right or left, for example, where the study is of the arm and the order master file does not distinguish right from left, or whether a study is to be done with or without contrast (when the order master file does not make such distinctions).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CategoryIdentifier<a name="conceptdomains-CategoryIdentifier"> </a></td><td>Category Identifier (0412)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a category name (term given to a group of service items for the purpose of classification). Examples: Laboratory, Pharmacy, Diagnostic Imaging, etc.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentIdentifier<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentIdentifier"> </a></td><td>Consent Identifier (0413)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that provide an identifier for the consent specified for a service item.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">UnitsOfTime<a name="conceptdomains-UnitsOfTime"> </a></td><td>Units of Time (0414)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a unit of time.  No suggested values.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransferType<a name="conceptdomains-TransferType"> </a></td><td>Transfer Type (0415)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a type of hospital receiving a transfer patient, which affects how a facility is reimbursed under diagnosis related group (DRG's), for example, exempt or non-exempt.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcedureDrgType<a name="conceptdomains-ProcedureDrgType"> </a></td><td>Procedure DRG Type (0416)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a procedure's priority ranking relative to its DRG.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TissueTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-TissueTypeCode"> </a></td><td>Tissue Type Code (0417)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the type of tissue removed from a patient during a procedure.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcedurePriority<a name="conceptdomains-ProcedurePriority"> </a></td><td>Procedure Priority (0418)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a number that identifies the significance or priority of the procedure code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SeverityOfIllnessCode<a name="conceptdomains-SeverityOfIllnessCode"> </a></td><td>Severity of Illness Code (0421)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the severity ranking of a patient's illness.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TriageCode<a name="conceptdomains-TriageCode"> </a></td><td>Triage Code (0422)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a patient's prioritization within the context of this abstract.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CaseCategoryCode<a name="conceptdomains-CaseCategoryCode"> </a></td><td>Case Category Code (0423)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the reason a non-urgent patient presents to the emergency room for treatment instead of a clinic or physican office.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">GestationCategoryCode<a name="conceptdomains-GestationCategoryCode"> </a></td><td>Gestation Category Code (0424)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the status of the birth in relation to the gestation</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NewbornCode<a name="conceptdomains-NewbornCode"> </a></td><td>Newborn Code (0425)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying whether the baby was born in or out of the facility.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BloodProductCode<a name="conceptdomains-BloodProductCode"> </a></td><td>Blood Product Code (0426)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the blood product code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RiskManagementIncidentCode<a name="conceptdomains-RiskManagementIncidentCode"> </a></td><td>Risk Management Incident Code (0427)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the incident that occurred during a patient's stay.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IncidentTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-IncidentTypeCode"> </a></td><td>Incident Type Code (0428)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a classification of the incident type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProductionClassCode<a name="conceptdomains-ProductionClassCode"> </a></td><td>Production Class Code (0429)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the code and/or text indicating the primary use for which the living subject was bred or grown.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ModeOfArrivalCode<a name="conceptdomains-ModeOfArrivalCode"> </a></td><td>Mode of Arrival Code (0430)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying how the patient was brought to the healthcare facility.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RecreationalDrugUseCode<a name="conceptdomains-RecreationalDrugUseCode"> </a></td><td>Recreational Drug Use Code (0431)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying what recreational drugs the patient uses.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdmissionLevelOfCareCode<a name="conceptdomains-AdmissionLevelOfCareCode"> </a></td><td>Admission Level of Care Code (0432)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the acuity level assigned to the patient at the time of admission.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PrecautionCode<a name="conceptdomains-PrecautionCode"> </a></td><td>Precaution Code (0433)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying non-clincal precautions that need to be taken with the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PatientConditionCode<a name="conceptdomains-PatientConditionCode"> </a></td><td>Patient Condition Code (0434)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the patient's current medical condition for the purpose of communicating to non-medical outside parties, e.g. family, employer, religious minister, media, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdvanceDirectiveCode<a name="conceptdomains-AdvanceDirectiveCode"> </a></td><td>Advance Directive Code (0435)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the patient's instructions to the healthcare facility.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SensitivityToCausativeAgentCode<a name="conceptdomains-SensitivityToCausativeAgentCode"> </a></td><td>Sensitivity to Causative Agent Code (0436)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the reason the patient should not be exposed to a substance.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AlertDeviceCode<a name="conceptdomains-AlertDeviceCode"> </a></td><td>Alert Device Code (0437)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying any type of allergy alert device the patient may be carrying or wearing.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AllergyClinicalStatus<a name="conceptdomains-AllergyClinicalStatus"> </a></td><td>Allergy Clinical Status (0438)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the verification status for the allergy.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DataTypes<a name="conceptdomains-DataTypes"> </a></td><td>Data Types (0440)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the data type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ImmunizationRegistryStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ImmunizationRegistryStatus"> </a></td><td>Immunization Registry Status (0441)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the immunization registry status of the patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-LocationServiceCode"> </a></td><td>Location Service Code (0442)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the types of services provided by the location.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProviderRole<a name="conceptdomains-ProviderRole"> </a></td><td>Provider Role (0443)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the functional involvement with the activity being transmitted (e.g., Case Manager, Evaluator, Transcriber, Nurse Care Practitioner, Midwife, Physician Assistant, etc.).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NameAssemblyOrder<a name="conceptdomains-NameAssemblyOrder"> </a></td><td>Name Assembly Order (0444)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the preferred display order of the components of this person name.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IdentityReliabilityCode<a name="conceptdomains-IdentityReliabilityCode"> </a></td><td>Identity Reliability Code (0445)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the reliability of patient/person identifying data transmitted via a transaction.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpeciesCode<a name="conceptdomains-SpeciesCode"> </a></td><td>Species Code (0446)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the species of living organism.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BreedCode<a name="conceptdomains-BreedCode"> </a></td><td>Breed Code (0447)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the specific breed of animal.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NameContext<a name="conceptdomains-NameContext"> </a></td><td>Name Context (0448)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the context in which a name is used.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EQPEventType<a name="conceptdomains-EQPEventType"> </a></td><td>Event Type (0450)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the type of event of the message.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SubstanceIdentifier<a name="conceptdomains-SubstanceIdentifier"> </a></td><td>Substance Identifier (0451)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the substance that is in inventory.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">HealthCareProviderTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-HealthCareProviderTypeCode"> </a></td><td>Health Care Provider Type Code (0452)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the major grouping of the service or occupation of a practitioner at a specific organization unit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">HealthCareProviderClassification<a name="conceptdomains-HealthCareProviderClassification"> </a></td><td>Health Care Provider Classification (0453)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the more specific service or occupation within the healthcare provider type of the practitioner at a specific organization unit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">HealthCareProviderAreaOfSpecialization<a name="conceptdomains-HealthCareProviderAreaOfSpecialization"> </a></td><td>Health Care Provider Area of Specialization (0454)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the segment of the population that a health care provider chooses to service, a specific medical service, a specialization in treating a specific disease, or any other descriptive characteristic about a provider’s practice relating to the services rendered of a practitioner at a specific organization unit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TypeOfBillCode<a name="conceptdomains-TypeOfBillCode"> </a></td><td>Type of Bill Code (0455)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the specific type of bill with digit 1 showing type of facility, digit 2 showing bill classification and digit 3 showing frequency.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RevenueCode<a name="conceptdomains-RevenueCode"> </a></td><td>Revenue code (0456)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a service line revenue code.  These are claim codes indicating the identifying number for the product or service provided.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OverallClaimDispositionCode<a name="conceptdomains-OverallClaimDispositionCode"> </a></td><td>Overall Claim Disposition Code (0457)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the final status of the claim.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OceEditCode<a name="conceptdomains-OceEditCode"> </a></td><td>OCE Edit Code (0458)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the edits that result from processing the HCPCS/CPT procedures for a record after evaluating all the codes, revenue codes, and modifiers.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReimbursementActionCode<a name="conceptdomains-ReimbursementActionCode"> </a></td><td>Reimbursement Action Code (0459)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the action to be taken during reimbursement calculations.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DenialOrRejectionCode<a name="conceptdomains-DenialOrRejectionCode"> </a></td><td>Denial or Rejection Code (0460)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the OCE status of the line item.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LicenseNumber<a name="conceptdomains-LicenseNumber"> </a></td><td>License Number (0461)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the license number for the facility.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LocationCostCenter<a name="conceptdomains-LocationCostCenter"> </a></td><td>Location Cost Center (0462)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the cost center to which this location belongs.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InventoryNumber<a name="conceptdomains-InventoryNumber"> </a></td><td>Inventory Number (0463)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying an identifying stock number, if any, which might be used, for example, as a cross reference for materials management.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">FacilityId<a name="conceptdomains-FacilityId"> </a></td><td>Facility ID (0464)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the facility of the institution for which a specified price is valid.  For use when needing multi-facility pricing.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Name_AddressRepresentation<a name="conceptdomains-Name_AddressRepresentation"> </a></td><td>Name/Address Representation (0465)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an indication of the representation provided by the data item.</p>
