</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AmbulatoryPaymentClassificationCode<a name="conceptdomains-AmbulatoryPaymentClassificationCode"> </a></td><td>Ambulatory Payment Classification Code (0466)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the derived Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ModifierEditCode<a name="conceptdomains-ModifierEditCode"> </a></td><td>Modifier Edit Code (0467)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the edits of the modifiers for each line or HCPCS/CPT.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PaymentAdjustmentCode<a name="conceptdomains-PaymentAdjustmentCode"> </a></td><td>Payment Adjustment Code (0468)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for any payment adjustment due to drugs or medical devices.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PackagingStatusCode<a name="conceptdomains-PackagingStatusCode"> </a></td><td>Packaging Status Code (0469)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the packaging status of the service.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReimbursementTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-ReimbursementTypeCode"> </a></td><td>Reimbursement Type Code (0470)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the fee schedule reimbursement type applied to a line item.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">QueryName<a name="conceptdomains-QueryName"> </a></td><td>Query Name (0471)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the name of a query.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TqConjunctionId<a name="conceptdomains-TqConjunctionId"> </a></td><td>TQ Conjunction ID (0472)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for that a second timing specification is to follow using the repeat delimiter.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ServiceFormularyStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ServiceFormularyStatus"> </a></td><td>Formulary Status (0473)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether or not the service (pharmaceutical) is in the formulary.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PractitionerOrganizationUnitType<a name="conceptdomains-PractitionerOrganizationUnitType"> </a></td><td>Practitioner Organization Unit Type (0474)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the classification of the organization unit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ChargeTypeReason<a name="conceptdomains-ChargeTypeReason"> </a></td><td>Charge Type Reason (0475)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the choice of, and providing the clinical rationale for, a selected charge type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2MedicallyNecessaryDuplicateProcedureReason<a name="conceptdomains-V2MedicallyNecessaryDuplicateProcedureReason"> </a></td><td>Medically Necessary Duplicate Procedure Reason (0476)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the reason the procedure code found in OBR-44 Procedure Code is a duplicate of one ordered/charged previously for the same patient within the same date of service and has been determined to be medically necessary.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ControlledSubstanceSchedule<a name="conceptdomains-ControlledSubstanceSchedule"> </a></td><td>Controlled Substance Schedule (0477)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the class of the drug or other substance if its usage is controlled by legislation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SubstanceFormularyStatus<a name="conceptdomains-SubstanceFormularyStatus"> </a></td><td>Formulary Status (0478)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether or not the pharmaceutical substance is part of the local formulary.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PharmaceuticalSubstances<a name="conceptdomains-PharmaceuticalSubstances"> </a></td><td>Pharmaceutical Substances (0479)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a medical substance or treatment that has been ordered to be given to a patient, as encoded by a pharmacy or treatment supplier.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PharmacyOrderTypes<a name="conceptdomains-PharmacyOrderTypes"> </a></td><td>Pharmacy Order Types (0480)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the general category of pharmacy order which may be used to determine the processing path the order will take.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OrderType<a name="conceptdomains-OrderType"> </a></td><td>Order Type (0482)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the order is to be executed in an inpatient setting or an outpatient setting.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AuthorizationMode<a name="conceptdomains-AuthorizationMode"> </a></td><td>Authorization Mode (0483)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values of forms of authorization a recorder may receive from the responsible practitioner to create or change an order.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DispenseType<a name="conceptdomains-DispenseType"> </a></td><td>Dispense Type (0484)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of dispensing event that occurred.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ExtendedPriorityCodes<a name="conceptdomains-ExtendedPriorityCodes"> </a></td><td>Extended Priority Codes (0485)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values describing the urgency of a request carried in an order.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenType<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenType"> </a></td><td>Specimen Type (0487)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe the precise nature of an entity that may be used as the source material for an observation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenCollectionMethod<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenCollectionMethod"> </a></td><td>Specimen Collection Method (0488)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the specimen collection method.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RiskCodes<a name="conceptdomains-RiskCodes"> </a></td><td>Risk Codes (0489)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for any known or suspected specimen hazards, e.g., exceptionally infectious agent or blood from a hepatitis patient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenRejectReason<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenRejectReason"> </a></td><td>Specimen Reject Reason (0490)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the reasons a specimen may be rejected for a specified observation/result/analysis.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenQuality<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenQuality"> </a></td><td>Specimen Quality (0491)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the degree or grade of excellence of the specimen at receipt.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenAppropriateness<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenAppropriateness"> </a></td><td>Specimen Appropriateness (0492)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the suitability of the specimen for the particular planned use as determined by the filler.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenCondition<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenCondition"> </a></td><td>Specimen Condition (0493)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a mode or state of being that describes the nature of a specimen.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenChildRole<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenChildRole"> </a></td><td>Specimen Child Role (0494)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for for child specimens the relationship between this specimen and the parent specimen.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BodySiteModifier<a name="conceptdomains-BodySiteModifier"> </a></td><td>Body Site Modifier (0495)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the modifier for the body site.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentType<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentType"> </a></td><td>Consent Type (0496)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for to what the subject is consenting, i.e. what type of service, surgical procedure, information access/release or other event.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentMode<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentMode"> </a></td><td>Consent Mode (0497)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the method in which a subject provides consent.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentStatus"> </a></td><td>Consent Status (0498)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for whether the consent has been sought and granted.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentBypassReason<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentBypassReason"> </a></td><td>Consent Bypass Reason (0499)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the reason the subject's consent was not sought.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentDisclosureLevel<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentDisclosureLevel"> </a></td><td>Consent Disclosure Level (0500)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify how much information was disclosed to the subject as part of the informed consent process.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConsentNon-disclosureReason<a name="conceptdomains-ConsentNon-disclosureReason"> </a></td><td>Consent Non-Disclosure Reason (0501)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a reason the subject did not receive full disclosure.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Non-subjectConsenterReason<a name="conceptdomains-Non-subjectConsenterReason"> </a></td><td>Non-Subject Consenter Reason (0502)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify a reason consent was granted by a person other than the subject of the consent.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Sequence_ResultsFlag<a name="conceptdomains-Sequence_ResultsFlag"> </a></td><td>Sequence/Results Flag (0503)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the sequencing relationship between the current service request and a related service request(s) specified in the same information model structure.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SequenceConditionCode<a name="conceptdomains-SequenceConditionCode"> </a></td><td>Sequence Condition Code (0504)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the relationship between the start/end of the related service request(s) and the current service request.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CyclicEntry_ExitIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-CyclicEntry_ExitIndicator"> </a></td><td>Cyclic Entry/Exit Indicator (0505)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify if this service request is the first or last service request in a cyclic series of service requests.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ServiceRequestRelationship<a name="conceptdomains-ServiceRequestRelationship"> </a></td><td>Service Request Relationship (0506)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify an additional or alternate relationship between this service request and other service requests.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ObservationResultHandling<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationResultHandling"> </a></td><td>Observation Result Handling (0507)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values regarding the handling of a result.  For example, an order may specify that the result (e.g., an x-ray film) should be given to the patient for return to the requestor.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BloodProductProcessingRequirements<a name="conceptdomains-BloodProductProcessingRequirements"> </a></td><td>Blood Product Processing Requirements (0508)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify additional information about the blood component class associated with the Universal Service ID.  The placer of the order can specify any required processing of the blood product that must be completed prior to transfusion to the intended recipient.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IndicationForUse<a name="conceptdomains-IndicationForUse"> </a></td><td>Indication for Use (0509)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason the blood product was ordered.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BloodProductDispenseStatus<a name="conceptdomains-BloodProductDispenseStatus"> </a></td><td>Blood Product Dispense Status (0510)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the current status of the specified blood product as indicated by the filler or placer.  For example, the first status change of a product that may trigger a Blood Product Dispense Status Message occurs when it first becomes linked to a patient and is ready to dispense. The placer system may use the Blood Product Dispense Status Message to request the transfusion service to dispense the product.  When the blood product is delivered or issued to a patient, the status of the blood product would be changed to indicate that it has now been &quot;dispensed&quot;.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BpObservationStatusCodesInterpretation<a name="conceptdomains-BpObservationStatusCodesInterpretation"> </a></td><td>BP Observation Status Codes Interpretation (0511)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the interpretation for the blood product observation status codes.  A status is considered preliminary until a blood product has reached a final disposition for the patient. For example, when the product is first cross-matched and a status message is sent, it would be considered preliminary. When the product is dispensed to the patient, that status would also be considered preliminary.  However, once the product is transfused, the status would be considered final.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CommercialProduct<a name="conceptdomains-CommercialProduct"> </a></td><td>Commercial Product (0512)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify a commercial product.  Examples of commercial products are blood derivatives such as Rh Immune Globulin and Factor VIII concentrate, Leukoreduction filters and blood administration sets.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BloodProductTransfusion_DispositionStatus<a name="conceptdomains-BloodProductTransfusion_DispositionStatus"> </a></td><td>Blood Product Transfusion/Disposition Status (0513)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the current status of the specified blood product as indicated by the placer.  For example, the placer may return the blood product to the transfusion service unused because an IV could not be started. The blood component may have been entered, but the line was clogged and could not be used, in which case the component must be wasted. A final status would indicate that the product has actually been &quot;transfused.&quot;</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransfusionAdverseReaction<a name="conceptdomains-TransfusionAdverseReaction"> </a></td><td>Transfusion Adverse Reaction (0514)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the type of adverse reaction that the recipient of the blood product experienced.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransfusionInterruptedReason<a name="conceptdomains-TransfusionInterruptedReason"> </a></td><td>Transfusion Interrupted Reason (0515)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason the transfusion of the blood product was interrupted.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ErrorSeverity<a name="conceptdomains-ErrorSeverity"> </a></td><td>Error Severity (0516)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the severity of an application error as reported during acknowledgment of messages. Knowing if something is Error, Warning or Information is intrinsic to how an application handles the content and the information flow.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InformPersonCode<a name="conceptdomains-InformPersonCode"> </a></td><td>Inform Person Code (0517)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify who (if anyone) shouldor should not be informed of an error.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OverrideType<a name="conceptdomains-OverrideType"> </a></td><td>Override Type (0518)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify what type of override can be used to override the specific error identified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OverrideReason<a name="conceptdomains-OverrideReason"> </a></td><td>Override Reason (0519)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the override codes that can be used to override enforcement of the application rule that generated an error.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2MessageWaitingPriority<a name="conceptdomains-V2MessageWaitingPriority"> </a></td><td>Message Waiting Priority (0520)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify how important the most important waiting mesasge is.  For example, if there are 3 low priority messages, 1 medium priority message and 1 high priority message, the message waiting priority would be &quot;high&quot;, because that is the highest priority of any new message waiting.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OverrideCode<a name="conceptdomains-OverrideCode"> </a></td><td>Override Code (0521)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason for the business rule override.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ComputationType<a name="conceptdomains-ComputationType"> </a></td><td>Computation Type (0523)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify if the change is computed as a percent change or as an absolute change.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Privilege<a name="conceptdomains-Privilege"> </a></td><td>Privilege (0525)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the institutional privilege.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PrivilegeClass<a name="conceptdomains-PrivilegeClass"> </a></td><td>Privilege Class (0526)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the class category of institutional privilege.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CalendarAlignment<a name="conceptdomains-CalendarAlignment"> </a></td><td>Calendar Alignment (0527)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify an alignment of the repetition to a calendar (e.g., to distinguish every  30 days from &quot;the 5th of every month&quot;).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EventRelatedPeriod<a name="conceptdomains-EventRelatedPeriod"> </a></td><td>Event Related Period (0528)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify a common (periodical) activity of daily living.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Organization_Agency_Department<a name="conceptdomains-Organization_Agency_Department"> </a></td><td>Organization, Agency, Department (0530)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the agency or department that assigned a specified identifier.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Institution<a name="conceptdomains-Institution"> </a></td><td>Institution (0531)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the institution where a staff member is or was active.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ExpandedYes_NoIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-ExpandedYes_NoIndicator"> </a></td><td>Expanded Yes/no Indicator (0532)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify an expansion on the original Yes/No indicator table by including &quot;flavors of null&quot;.  It is intended to be applied to fields where the response is not limited to &quot;yes&quot; or &quot;no&quot;.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ApplicationErrorCode<a name="conceptdomains-ApplicationErrorCode"> </a></td><td>Application Error Code (0533)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the application specific code identifying the specific error that occurred.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NotifyClergyCode<a name="conceptdomains-NotifyClergyCode"> </a></td><td>Notify Clergy Code (0534)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify whether the clergy should be notified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SignatureCode<a name="conceptdomains-SignatureCode"> </a></td><td>Signature Code (0535)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate how a patient/subscriber authorization signature is obtained and how it is being retained by a provider.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CertificateStatus<a name="conceptdomains-CertificateStatus"> </a></td><td>Certificate Status (0536)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the status of the certificate held by a health professional.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Institution2<a name="conceptdomains-Institution2"> </a></td><td>Institution (0537)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the institution a specified practitioner began or intends to begin practicing at (e.g., at hospital, at physician organization, at managed care network).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InstitutionRelationshipType<a name="conceptdomains-InstitutionRelationshipType"> </a></td><td>Institution Relationship Type (0538)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the relationship the staff person has with the institution for whom he/she provides services.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CostCenterCode<a name="conceptdomains-CostCenterCode"> </a></td><td>Cost Center Code (0539)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the organization unit in the General Ledger to which the staff member is currently assigned.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InactiveReasonCode<a name="conceptdomains-InactiveReasonCode"> </a></td><td>Inactive Reason Code (0540)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason the staff member is inactive.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenTypeModifier<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenTypeModifier"> </a></td><td>Specimen Type Modifier (0541)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the modifying or qualifying description(s) about the specimen type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenSourceTypeModifier<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenSourceTypeModifier"> </a></td><td>Specimen Source Type Modifier (0542)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the modifying or qualifying description(s) about the specimen source site.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SpecimenCollectionSite<a name="conceptdomains-SpecimenCollectionSite"> </a></td><td>Specimen Collection Site (0543)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the modifying or qualifying description(s) about the specimen collection site.  This Domain differs from SpecimenSourceSite in those cases where the source site must be approached via a particular site (e.g., anatomic location). For example, in the case where a liver biopsy is obtained via a percutaneous needle, the collection site would be the point of entry of the needle. For venous blood collected from the left radial vein, the collection site could be “antecubital fossa”.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContainerCondition<a name="conceptdomains-ContainerCondition"> </a></td><td>Container Condition (0544)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify at each receipt the status of the container in which the specimen is shipped in chain of custody cases where specimens are moved from lab to lab.  If the container is compromised in any way (seal broken, container cracked or leaking, etc.), then this status needs to be recorded for legal reasons.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">JurisdictionalBreadth<a name="conceptdomains-JurisdictionalBreadth"> </a></td><td>Jurisdictional Breadth (0547)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the breadth/extent of the jurisdiction where the qualification is valid.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SignatorysRelationshipToSubject<a name="conceptdomains-SignatorysRelationshipToSubject"> </a></td><td>Signatory's Relationship to Subject (0548)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the relationship of the consenter to the subject.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">NdcCodes<a name="conceptdomains-NdcCodes"> </a></td><td>NDC Codes (0549)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the National Drug Codes (NDC) that are required by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) for electronic claims for pharmacy charges.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BodyParts<a name="conceptdomains-BodyParts"> </a></td><td>Body Parts (0550)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values to specify the part of the body.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdvancedBeneficiaryNoticeOverrideReason<a name="conceptdomains-AdvancedBeneficiaryNoticeOverrideReason"> </a></td><td>Advanced Beneficiary Notice Override Reason (0552)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason the patient did not sign an Advanced Beneficiary Notice.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InvoiceControlCode<a name="conceptdomains-InvoiceControlCode"> </a></td><td>Invoice Control Code (0553)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify what invoice action is being performed by this message.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InvoiceReasonCodes<a name="conceptdomains-InvoiceReasonCodes"> </a></td><td>Invoice Reason Codes (0554)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the reason for an invoice.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">InvoiceType<a name="conceptdomains-InvoiceType"> </a></td><td>Invoice Type (0555)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the type of invoice.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BenefitGroup<a name="conceptdomains-BenefitGroup"> </a></td><td>Benefit Group (0556)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the benefit group.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PayeeType<a name="conceptdomains-PayeeType"> </a></td><td>Payee Type (0557)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the type of payee (e.g., organization, person).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PayeeRelationshipToInvoice<a name="conceptdomains-PayeeRelationshipToInvoice"> </a></td><td>Payee Relationship to Invoice (0558)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values used to specify the relationship to the invoice for Person Payee Types.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Product_ServiceStatus<a name="conceptdomains-Product_ServiceStatus"> </a></td><td>Product/Service Status (0559)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the processing status for the Product/Service Code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">QuantityUnits<a name="conceptdomains-QuantityUnits"> </a></td><td>Quantity Units (0560)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the adjustment quantity.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessingConsiderationCodes<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessingConsiderationCodes"> </a></td><td>Processing Consideration Codes (0562)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify special processing requested of Payer for this Product/Service Line Item (e.g., hold until paper supporting documentation is received by Payer).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AdjustmentCategoryCode<a name="conceptdomains-AdjustmentCategoryCode"> </a></td><td>Adjustment Category Code (0564)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values used to specify the category of adjustment and is used to assist in determining which table is used for Adjustment Reason.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProviderAdjustmentReasonCode<a name="conceptdomains-ProviderAdjustmentReasonCode"> </a></td><td>Provider Adjustment Reason Code (0565)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values used to specify the reason for this adjustment.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LaborCalculationType<a name="conceptdomains-LaborCalculationType"> </a></td><td>Labor Calculation Type (0651)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the method used to calculate employee labor and measure employee productivity.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DeviceDataState<a name="conceptdomains-DeviceDataState"> </a></td><td>Device Data State (0667)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the state of the data as provided from a device.</p>

A cycle type is a specific sterilization method used for a specific type of supply item.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AccessRestrictionValue<a name="conceptdomains-AccessRestrictionValue"> </a></td><td>Access Restriction Value (0717)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the policies governing the information to which access is contolled.</p>

</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DRGProcedureRelevance<a name="conceptdomains-DRGProcedureRelevance"> </a></td><td>DRG Procedure Relevance (0763)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the relevance of this particular procedure for the diagnosis related group (DRG) determination.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ResourceTypeOrCategory<a name="conceptdomains-ResourceTypeOrCategory"> </a></td><td>Resource Type or Category (0771)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a high level categorization of resources.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ItemStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ItemStatus"> </a></td><td>Item Status (0776)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the status (useful for reporting and item usage purposes) that applies to an item.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ItemType<a name="conceptdomains-ItemType"> </a></td><td>Item Type (0778)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for a classification of material items into like groups as defined and utilized within an operating room setting for charting procedures.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ApprovingRegulatoryAgency<a name="conceptdomains-ApprovingRegulatoryAgency"> </a></td><td>Approving Regulatory Agency (0790)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the regulatory agency by which the item has been approved, such as the FDA or AMA.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RulingAct<a name="conceptdomains-RulingAct"> </a></td><td>Ruling Act (0793)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for an act containing a rule that the item is legally required to be included in notification reporting.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SterilizationType<a name="conceptdomains-SterilizationType"> </a></td><td>Sterilization Type (0806)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the type of sterilization used for sterilizing the inventory supply item in the ITM segment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MaintenanceCycle<a name="conceptdomains-MaintenanceCycle"> </a></td><td>Maintenance Cycle (0809)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the maintenance cycle used for the inventory supply item, such as the number of times to sharpen after five uses.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MaintenanceType<a name="conceptdomains-MaintenanceType"> </a></td><td>Maintenance Type (0811)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the type of maintenance performed on the inventory supply item.  This is different than the maintenance cycle in the sense that it can describe the number of maintenance cycles that can be performed before disposing of the inventory supply item.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Package<a name="conceptdomains-Package"> </a></td><td>Package (0818)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the packaging unit in which this inventory supply item can be ordered or issued when purchased from the vendor in the related vendor segment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MimeTypes<a name="conceptdomains-MimeTypes"> </a></td><td>MIME Types (0834)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the general type of data.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProblemSeverity<a name="conceptdomains-ProblemSeverity"> </a></td><td>Problem Severity (0836)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the severity of a problem.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProblemPerspective<a name="conceptdomains-ProblemPerspective"> </a></td><td>Problem Perspective (0838)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying from whose perspective a problem was identified.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ReferralDocumentationCompletionStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ReferralDocumentationCompletionStatus"> </a></td><td>Referral Documentation Completion Status (0865)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying to the receiving provider that the clinical history in the message is incomplete and that more will follow.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TelecommunicationExpirationReason<a name="conceptdomains-TelecommunicationExpirationReason"> </a></td><td>Telecommunication Expiration Reason (0868)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the reason this contact number/email was marked as &quot;ended&quot;.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SupplyRiskCodes<a name="conceptdomains-SupplyRiskCodes"> </a></td><td>Supply Risk Codes (0871)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying any known or suspected hazard associated with this material item.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Product_ServiceCode<a name="conceptdomains-Product_ServiceCode"> </a></td><td>Product/Service Code (0879)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying what service was delivered/received.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Product_ServiceCodeModifier<a name="conceptdomains-Product_ServiceCodeModifier"> </a></td><td>Product/Service Code Modifier (0880)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying additional optional modifier(s) for the Product/Service Code (e.g., after hours - evening, after hours - weekend).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RoleExecutingPhysician<a name="conceptdomains-RoleExecutingPhysician"> </a></td><td>Role Executing Physician (0881)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the account role of the physician, for example, only billing for the professional part, the technical part or both.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MedicalRoleExecutingPhysician<a name="conceptdomains-MedicalRoleExecutingPhysician"> </a></td><td>Medical Role Executing Physician (0882)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the role of the physician (&quot;self-employed&quot; or &quot;employed&quot;).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SideOfBody<a name="conceptdomains-SideOfBody"> </a></td><td>Side of body (0894)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the side of the body (&quot;left&quot; or &quot;right&quot;).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PresentOnAdmissionIndicator<a name="conceptdomains-PresentOnAdmissionIndicator"> </a></td><td>Present On Admission (POA) Indicator (0895)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the present on admission indicator for this particular diagnosis.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SecurityCheckScheme<a name="conceptdomains-SecurityCheckScheme"> </a></td><td>Security Check Scheme (0904)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the scheme for a security check.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ShipmentStatus<a name="conceptdomains-ShipmentStatus"> </a></td><td>Shipment Status (0905)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the status of a shipment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2ActPriority<a name="conceptdomains-V2ActPriority"> </a></td><td>ActPriority (0906)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the priority for a shipment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2Confidentiality<a name="conceptdomains-V2Confidentiality"> </a></td><td>Confidentiality (0907)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the confidentiality for a shipment.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PackageType<a name="conceptdomains-PackageType"> </a></td><td>Package Type (0908)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the type of package.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PatientResultsReleaseCategorizationScheme<a name="conceptdomains-PatientResultsReleaseCategorizationScheme"> </a></td><td>Patient Results Release Categorization Scheme (0909)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the scheme for the patient results release categorization.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">AcquisitionModality<a name="conceptdomains-AcquisitionModality"> </a></td><td>Acquisition Modality (0910)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the modality for the acquisition of an image.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Participation<a name="conceptdomains-Participation"> </a></td><td>Participation (0912)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that represent functional involvement of a caregiver or member of a care team with an activity being transmitted (e.g., Case Manager, Evaluator, Transcriber, Nurse Care Practitioner, Midwife, Physician Assistant, etc.).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">MonetaryDenominationCode<a name="conceptdomains-MonetaryDenominationCode"> </a></td><td>Monetary Denomination Code (0913)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the denomination in which the quantity is expressed. Values commonly used are the three-character codes specified in  ISO-4217 (1.0.4217 iso4217).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RootCause<a name="conceptdomains-RootCause"> </a></td><td>Root Cause (0914)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a root cause.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessControlCode<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessControlCode"> </a></td><td>Process Control Code (0915)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a process control code.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RelevantClinicialInformation<a name="conceptdomains-RelevantClinicialInformation"> </a></td><td>Relevant Clincial Information (0916)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for additional clinical information about the patient or specimen to report the supporting and/or suspected diagnosis and clinical findings on requests for interpreted diagnostic studies.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">BolusType<a name="conceptdomains-BolusType"> </a></td><td>Bolus Type (0917)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a type of bolus.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PcaType<a name="conceptdomains-PcaType"> </a></td><td>PCA Type (0918)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a type of PCA.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ExclusiveTest<a name="conceptdomains-ExclusiveTest"> </a></td><td>Exclusive Test (0919)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that define if a test should be a specific event with no other tests to be performed with this test, or not, or other special circumstances.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PreferredSpecimen_AttributeStatus<a name="conceptdomains-PreferredSpecimen_AttributeStatus"> </a></td><td>Preferred Specimen/Attribute Status (0920)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that indicate whether a Specimen/Attribute is Preferred or Alternate for collection of a particular specimen.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CertificationTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-CertificationTypeCode"> </a></td><td>Certification Type Code (0921)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the code for a certification type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CertificationCategoryCode<a name="conceptdomains-CertificationCategoryCode"> </a></td><td>Certification Category Code (0922)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the code for a certification category.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessInterruption<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessInterruption"> </a></td><td>Process Interruption (0923)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying whether a process was interrrupted and whether a needle had been inserted in the donor's arm prior to the interruption.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CumulativeDosageLimitUom<a name="conceptdomains-CumulativeDosageLimitUom"> </a></td><td>Cumulative Dosage Limit UoM (0924)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the unit of measure (UoM) for the cumulative dosage limit.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PhlebotomyIssue<a name="conceptdomains-PhlebotomyIssue"> </a></td><td>Phlebotomy Issue (0925)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a phlebotomy issue.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PhlebotomyStatus<a name="conceptdomains-PhlebotomyStatus"> </a></td><td>Phlebotomy Status (0926)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the status of a phlebotomy.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ArmStick<a name="conceptdomains-ArmStick"> </a></td><td>Arm Stick (0927)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the arm(s) receiving a stick.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">WeightUnitsSNAFU<a name="conceptdomains-WeightUnitsSNAFU"> </a></td><td>Weight Units (0929)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values of units of measure that are used to specify weight.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">VolumeUnitsSNAFU<a name="conceptdomains-VolumeUnitsSNAFU"> </a></td><td>Volume Units (0930)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values of units of measure that are used to specify volume.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TemperatureUnits<a name="conceptdomains-TemperatureUnits"> </a></td><td>Temperature Units (0931)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying  the units of transport temperature.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DonationDurationUnits<a name="conceptdomains-DonationDurationUnits"> </a></td><td>Donation Duration Units (0932)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the units of donation duration.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">IntendedProcedureType<a name="conceptdomains-IntendedProcedureType"> </a></td><td>Intended Procedure Type (0933)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the type of intended procedure.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OrderWorkflowProfile<a name="conceptdomains-OrderWorkflowProfile"> </a></td><td>Order Workflow Profile (0934)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the profile of the order workflow.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ProcessInterruptionReason<a name="conceptdomains-ProcessInterruptionReason"> </a></td><td>Process Interruption Reason (0935)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the reason for a process interruption.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">V2ObservationType<a name="conceptdomains-V2ObservationType"> </a></td><td>Observation Type (0936)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for types of observations to enable systems to distinguish between observations sent along with an order, versus observations sent as the result to an order.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ObservationSub-type<a name="conceptdomains-ObservationSub-type"> </a></td><td>Observation Sub-Type (0937)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying an observation sub-type.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CollectionEvent_ProcessStepLimit<a name="conceptdomains-CollectionEvent_ProcessStepLimit"> </a></td><td>Collection Event/Process Step Limit (0938)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying the limit for a collection event or process step.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">CommunicationLocation<a name="conceptdomains-CommunicationLocation"> </a></td><td>Communication Location (0939)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a communication location.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">LimitationTypeCodes<a name="conceptdomains-LimitationTypeCodes"> </a></td><td>Limitation Type Codes (0940)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying a type of limitation.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PayerCoverageProcedureCode<a name="conceptdomains-PayerCoverageProcedureCode"> </a></td><td>Procedure Code (0941)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values specifying procedure codes that may impact payer coverage requirements, for example procedure code 1234 is not covered by a payer ABCD or may be covered in conjunction with a specific diagnosis code which can be identifeid in DPS-1 Diagnosis Code. The procedure codes should be drawn from appropriate externally defined procedure codes, for example in the US Realm these include CPT-4 codes defined by the American Medical Association and ICD codes published by CMS.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">EquipmentStateIndicatorTypeCode<a name="conceptdomains-EquipmentStateIndicatorTypeCode"> </a></td><td>Equipment State Indicator Type Code (0942)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that specify the type of measurement of the state of an automated laboratory instrument.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransportDestination<a name="conceptdomains-TransportDestination"> </a></td><td>Transport Destination (0943)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the destination for transport of a specific container.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">TransportRoute<a name="conceptdomains-TransportRoute"> </a></td><td>Transport Route (0944)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that identify the route for transport of a specific container.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">Auto-dilutionType<a name="conceptdomains-Auto-dilutionType"> </a></td><td>Auto-Dilution Type (0945)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the pre‑configured dilution to be applied on the instrument, which can be used instead of a numeric declaration.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">SupplierType<a name="conceptdomains-SupplierType"> </a></td><td>Supplier Type (0946)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of supplier that will distribute the supply items associated to a contract number.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ClassOfTrade<a name="conceptdomains-ClassOfTrade"> </a></td><td>Class of Trade (0947)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the purchasing channel with which the contract is associated  such as Hospital, Retail, etc.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">RelationshipType<a name="conceptdomains-RelationshipType"> </a></td><td>Relationship Type (0948)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values for the type of relationship that is established between the instances of Source Information and  Target Information.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">orderControlCodeReason<a name="conceptdomains-orderControlCodeReason"> </a></td><td>Order Control Code Reason (0949)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that describe reasons for the chosen order control codes.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">orderStatusModifier<a name="conceptdomains-orderStatusModifier"> </a></td><td>Order Status Modifier (0950)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that further define an identified status.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">reasonForStudy<a name="conceptdomains-reasonForStudy"> </a></td><td>Reason for Study (0951)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values that provide additional information to the universal service identifier on why a test, study or review was ordered.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ConfidentialityV2<a name="conceptdomains-ConfidentialityV2"> </a></td><td>Confidentiality Classification (0952)</td><td><div><p>Types of privacy metadata classifying an IT resource (data, information object, service, or system capability) according to its level of sensitivity, which is based on an analysis of applicable privacy policies and the risk of financial, reputational, or other harm to an individual or entity that could result if made available or disclosed to unauthorized individuals, entities, or processes.
Usage Note : Confidentiality codes may be used in security labels and privacy markings to classify IT resources based on sensitivity to indicate the obligation of a custodian or receiver to ensure that the protected resource is not made available or disclosed to individuals, entities, or processes (security principals) unless authorized per applicable policies. Confidentiality codes may also be used in the clearances of initiators requesting access to protected resources.
Map: Definition aligns with ISO 7498-2:1989 - Confidentiality is the property that information is not made available or disclosed to unauthorized individuals, entities, or processes</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">WorkClassificationODH<a name="conceptdomains-WorkClassificationODH"> </a></td><td>Work Classification ODH (0959)</td><td><div><p>Types of a person’s employment type as defined by compensation and sector (e.g. paid vs. unpaid, self-employed vs. not self-employed, government vs. private, etc.).</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DataAbsentReason<a name="conceptdomains-DataAbsentReason"> </a></td><td>Data Absent Reason (0960)</td><td><div><p>??</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DeviceTypeSNAFU<a name="conceptdomains-DeviceTypeSNAFU"> </a></td><td>Device Type (0961)</td><td><div><p>Domain of concepts describing what kind a particular device is. Focus here is on devices used in the medical field.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DeviceStatusSNAFU<a name="conceptdomains-DeviceStatusSNAFU"> </a></td><td>Device Status (0962)</td><td><div><p>The domain describing the availability status of a device.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">DeviceSafety<a name="conceptdomains-DeviceSafety"> </a></td><td>Device Safety (0963)</td><td><div><p>The domain describing safety characteristics of medical devices.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ServiceReason<a name="conceptdomains-ServiceReason"> </a></td><td>Service Reason (0964)</td><td><div><p>Domain of concepts describing reasons why a particular service was performed.
This could be explaining why something was ordered differently than typically done, or explain that it was ordered by mistake.
	Patient disability requires it
	No provider in network
	Patient paid out of pocket</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContractType<a name="conceptdomains-ContractType"> </a></td><td>Contract Type (0965)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values describing the scope of contracts in a masterfile, e.g.:
•	Local
•	Regional
•	Global</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">PricingTierLevel<a name="conceptdomains-PricingTierLevel"> </a></td><td>Pricing Tier Level (0966)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values describing the declared level of pricing for a particular product under a contract, usually based on a discount for larger orders under the contract – often assigned numerically, e.g.:
•	Tier 1
•	Tier 2
•	Tier 3</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContainerFormV2<a name="conceptdomains-ContainerFormV2"> </a></td><td>Container Form (0967)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values describing shape or type of the container, e.g.:
•	Tube/vial
•	Jar
•	Bag
•	Block
•	Slide</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContainerMaterial<a name="conceptdomains-ContainerMaterial"> </a></td><td>Container Material (0968)</td><td><div><p>The domain of possible values describing the material a container is made of or indication that the container may be a virtual type, e.g.:
•	Glass
•	Plastic
•	Whole Slide Image</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">ContainerCommonName<a name="conceptdomains-ContainerCommonName"> </a></td><td>Container Common Name (0969)</td><td><div><p>Codes created by an organization as a shorthand way to express a combination of container attributes; for example the combination of SAC-47 (Container Form) of “Tube/vial” + SAC-48 (Container Material) of “Glass” + SAC-27 (Additive) of “EDTA” may be referenced commonly in an organization as a “Lavender Top”, e.g.:
•	Lavender Top
•	Wet Mount (slides for parasitology)
•	LJ plate (for Mycobacterium cultures)</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OnlineVerificationResult<a name="conceptdomains-OnlineVerificationResult"> </a></td><td>Online Verification Result (0970)</td><td><div><p>Domain of values for the results of an operation to perform online verification of insurance data</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">OnlineVerificationResultErrorCode<a name="conceptdomains-OnlineVerificationResultErrorCode"> </a></td><td>Online Verification Result Error Code (0971)</td><td><div><p>Domain of values representing a type of error from a failed operation to perform online verification of insurance data.</p>
</div></td><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td/><td>v2</td><td/></tr></table></div>
  </text>

         value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#openIssue"/>

    <code value="source"/>
    <uri
         value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#source"/>
    <description value="Source"/>
    <type value="code"/>
  </property>
  <property>
    <code value="synonymCode"/>
    <uri value="http://hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties#synonym"/>
    <description
                 value="An additional concept code that was also attributed to a concept"/>
    <type value="code"/>
  </property>
